18460908Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int NestedTask(IEnumerable<MatchTier> tierNodes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var tasks = tierNodes.Select(node => Task<int>.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Task logic goes hereDi2015NewLine                return 1; // temp placeholderDi2015NewLine            })).ToList(); // Enumerate to start tasks, not doing this would case WaitAll to start them one at a time (i believe)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (!Task.WaitAll(tasks, timeOutInMilliseconds))Di2015NewLine    // Handle timeout...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return tasks.First().Result; // Is this what you want?Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18460908Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int NestedTask(IEnumerable<string> tierNodes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int parentTimeout = 15 * 1000;Di2015NewLine  int childTimeout = 3 * 1000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var tier = Task<int>.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      foreach (var n in tierNodes)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          var node = Task<int>.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine              // Task logic goes hereDi2015NewLine              return 1;Di2015NewLine          });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          // If we get the result we return it, else we waitDi2015NewLine          if (node.Wait(childTimeout))Di2015NewLine              return node.Result;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      throw new Exception("did not get result!");Di2015NewLine  });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (!tier.Wait(parentTimeout))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      // The child will continue on running though.Di2015NewLine      throw new TimeoutException("parent timed out");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  else if (tier.Exception != null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      // We have an errorDi2015NewLine      throw tier.Exception.InnerException;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return tier.Result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18462104Di2015UniqueSeparatorInput: f; coef is 1 + 2^NDi2015NewLine p = f * coef;Di2015NewLine q = f - p;Di2015NewLine h = p + q;  // h contains the 53-N highest bits of fDi2015NewLine l = f - h;  // l contains the N lowest bits of fDi2015NewLine

18462691Di2015UniqueSeparator   public static String GetAllEncodings(String value) {Di2015NewLine      List<Encoding> encodings = new List<Encoding>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Ordinary code pagesDi2015NewLine      foreach (EncodingInfo info in Encoding.GetEncodings()) Di2015NewLine        encodings.Add(Encoding.GetEncoding(info.CodePage));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Special encodings, that could have no code pageDi2015NewLine      foreach (PropertyInfo pi in typeof(Encoding).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public))Di2015NewLine        if (pi.CanRead && pi.PropertyType == typeof(Encoding))Di2015NewLine          encodings.Add(pi.GetValue(null) as Encoding);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      foreach (Encoding encoding in encodings) {Di2015NewLine        Byte[] data = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(value);Di2015NewLine        String test = encoding.GetString(data).Replace('\\0', '?');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Sb.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine          Sb.AppendLine();    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Sb.Append(encoding.WebName);Di2015NewLine        Sb.Append(" (code page = ");Di2015NewLine        Sb.Append(encoding.CodePage);Di2015NewLine        Sb.Append(")");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Sb.Append(" -> ");Di2015NewLine        Sb.Append(test);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return Sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Test / usageDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String St = "? ?? ?";      // <- Some Russian TextDi2015NewLine    Byte[] d = Encoding.UTF32.GetBytes(St); // <- Was encoded as UTF 32Di2015NewLine    St = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(d);        // <- And erroneously read as UTF 8Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Let's see all the encodings:Di2015NewLine    myTextBox.Text = GetAllEncodings(St);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // In the myTextBox.Text you can find the solution:Di2015NewLine    // ....Di2015NewLine    // utf-32 (code page = 12000) -> ? ?? ?Di2015NewLine    // ....Di2015NewLine

18465931Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal int NewRecordFromArray(object[] value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count = this.columnCollection.Count;Di2015NewLine    if (count < value.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw ExceptionBuilder.ValueArrayLength();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int num = this.recordManager.NewRecordBase();Di2015NewLine    int result;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < value.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value[i] != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.columnCollection[i][num] = value[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.columnCollection[i].Init(num);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (int j = value.Length; j < count; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.columnCollection[j].Init(num);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        result = num;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ADP.IsCatchableOrSecurityExceptionType(e))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.FreeRecord(ref num);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18465931Di2015UniqueSeparatorthis.columnCollection[i][num] = value[i];
18465931Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DataColumn this[int index]Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataColumn result;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = (DataColumn)this._list[index];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ArgumentOutOfRangeException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw ExceptionBuilder.ColumnOutOfRange(index);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

=> x.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<String> GetFieldsFor<T>(Boolean includeInheritedFields = true) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return includeInheritedFields = true) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<FieldInfo> fields = getFieldsFor<T>(includeInheritedFields);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IDictionary<String, Object> result = new Dictionary<String, Object>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var field in fields)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(field.Name, field.GetValue(obj));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine     * Property MethodsDi2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<String> GetProperties<T>(this T obj, Boolean includeInheritedProperties = true) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return getPropertiesFor<T>(includeInheritedProperties).Select(x => x.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<String> GetPropertiesFor<T>(Boolean includeInheritedProperties = true) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return getPropertiesFor<T>(includeInheritedProperties).Select(x => x.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static IDictionary<String, getPropertiesFor<T>(includeInheritedProperties);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IDictionary<String, Object> result = new Dictionary<String, Object>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(property.Name, property.GetValue(obj));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine     * Helper methodsDi2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<FieldInfo> getFieldsFor<T>(Boolean includeInheritedFields = true) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return typeof(T)Di2015NewLine            .GetFields(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance)Di2015NewLine            .Where(x => includeInheritedFields || x.DeclaringType == typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> getPropertiesFor<T>(Boolean includeInheritedFields = true) where T : 18468107Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SourceClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Int32 first = 1;Di2015NewLine    public Int32 second = 2;Di2015NewLine    public Int32 third = 3;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class MyConvertDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static object ToDynamic(object sourceObject, out Type outType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Int32 fieldOffset = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // get the public fields from the source objectDi2015NewLine        FieldInfo[] sourceFields = sourceObject.GetType().GetFields();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // get a dynamic TypeBuilder and inherit from the base typeDi2015NewLine        AssemblyName assemblyNameDi2015NewLine            = new AssemblyName("MyDynamicAssembly");Di2015NewLine        AssemblyBuilder assemblyBuilderDi2015NewLine            = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(Di2015NewLine                assemblyName,Di2015NewLine                AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLine        ModuleBuilder moduleBuilderDi2015NewLine            = assemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule("MyDynamicModule");Di2015NewLine        TypeBuilder typeBuilderDi2015NewLine            = moduleBuilder.DefineType(Di2015NewLine                "InternalType",Di2015NewLine                TypeAttributes.PublicDi2015NewLine                | TypeAttributes.ClassDi2015NewLine                | TypeAttributes.AutoClassDi2015NewLine                | TypeAttributes.AnsiClassDi2015NewLine                | TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout,Di2015NewLine                typeof(SomeOtherNamespace.MyBase));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add public fields to match the source objectDi2015NewLine        foreach (FieldInfo sourceField in sourceFields)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FieldBuilder fieldBuilderDi2015NewLine                = typeBuilder.DefineField(Di2015NewLine                    sourceField.Name,Di2015NewLine                    sourceField.FieldType,Di2015NewLine                    FieldAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLine            fieldBuilder.SetOffset(fieldOffset);Di2015NewLine            fieldOffset++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create the dynamic classDi2015NewLine        Type dynamicType = typeBuilder.CreateType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create an instance of the classDi2015NewLine        object destObject = Activator.CreateInstance(dynamicType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // copy the values of the public fields of theDi2015NewLine        // source object to the dynamic objectDi2015NewLine        foreach (FieldInfo sourceField in sourceFields)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FieldInfo destFieldDi2015NewLine                = destObject.GetType().GetField(sourceField.Name);Di2015NewLine            destField.SetValue(Di2015NewLine                destObject,Di2015NewLine                sourceField.GetValue(sourceObject));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // give the new class to the caller for casting purposesDi2015NewLine        outType = dynamicType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // return the new objectDi2015NewLine        return destObject;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18468370Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void TransformObject(object objObject, int LeftPadding, int TopPadding, int WidthChange, int HeightChange)Di2015NewLine{        Di2015NewLine    dynamic dynObject = (dynamic)objObject;Di2015NewLine    dynObject.Top = TopPadding;Di2015NewLine    dynObject.Left = LeftPadding;Di2015NewLine    dynObject.Width = WidthChange;Di2015NewLine    dynObject.Height = HeightChange;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18468370Di2015UniqueSeparatorControl
18468370Di2015UniqueSeparatorobject
18468456Di2015UniqueSeparatorFilter
18468456Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<object, bool>
18468456Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Predicate<object> GetPredicate(string column, string valueP, object objSource, string table)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type itemType = objSource.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ParameterExpression predParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object), "p");Di2015NewLine    Expression left = Expression.Property(Expression.Convert(predParam, itemType), "A_" + column+ "_" + table);Di2015NewLine    var valueStr= Expression.Constant(valueP);Di2015NewLine    var typeOfStr = valueStr.Type;Di2015NewLine    var containsMethod = typeOfStr.GetMethod("Contains", new [] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var call = Expression.Call(left, containsMethod, valueStr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //To handle null values. It considers null == string.EmptyDi2015NewLine    //var left2 = Expression.Coalesce(left, Expression.Constant(string.Empty));Di2015NewLine    //var call = Expression.Call(left2, containsMethod, valueStr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //If you want null values to be distinct from string.Empty, it'sDi2015NewLine    //much more complex. You'll need a temporary variable (left2)Di2015NewLine    //where to put the value of the property, and then you can use the Di2015NewLine    //Expression.Condition (that is the ? : ternary operator) to Di2015NewLine    //test for null valuesDi2015NewLine    //var left2 = Expression.Variable(typeof(string));Di2015NewLine    //var assign = Expression.Assign(left2, left);Di2015NewLine    //var notNull = Expression.NotEqual(left2, Expression.Constant(null));Di2015NewLine    //var call = Expression.Call(left2, containsMethod, valueStr);Di2015NewLine    //var condition = Expression.Condition(notNull, call, Expression.Constant(false));Di2015NewLine    //var block = Expression.Block(new[] { left2 }, new Expression[] { assign, condition });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Predicate<object> function = Expression.Lambda<Predicate<object>>(call, new[] { predParam }).Compile();Di2015NewLine    return function;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18468456Di2015UniqueSeparatornull
18468456Di2015UniqueSeparatorNullReferenceException

             });Di2015NewLine                // create the storeDi2015NewLine                var storeConfig = {Di2015NewLine                    storeId: 'store_' + me.id,Di2015NewLine 18477856Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<T>
18477856Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class MyList<T> : IEnumerable<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T[] list = new T[32];Di2015NewLine        int listLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Add(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (listLength + 1 > list.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T[] temp = new T[list.Length * 2];Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(list, temp, list.Length);Di2015NewLine                list = temp;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            list[listLength] = item;Di2015NewLine            listLength++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Remove(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < list.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                if (list[i].Equals(item))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void RemoveAt(int index)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (index < 0 || index >= listLength)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("'index' must be between 0 and list length.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (index == listLength - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                list[index] = default(T);Di2015NewLine                listLength = index;Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // need to shift the listDi2015NewLine            Array.Copy(list, index + 1, list, index, listLength - index + 1);Di2015NewLine            listLength--;Di2015NewLine            list[listLength] = default(T);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine        {                Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < listLength; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return list[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18486225Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string _privateKey;Di2015NewLineprivate static string _publicKey;Di2015NewLineprivate static UnicodeEncoding _encoder = new UnicodeEncoding();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void RSA()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var rsa = new RSACryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine  _privateKey = rsa.ToXmlString(true);Di2015NewLine  _publicKey = rsa.ToXmlString(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var text = "Test1";Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine("RSA // Text to encrypt: " + text);Di2015NewLine  var enc = Encrypt(text);Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine("RSA // Encrypted Text: " + enc);Di2015NewLine  var dec = Decrypt(enc);Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine("RSA // Decrypted Text: " + dec);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string Decrypt(string data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var rsa = new RSACryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine  var dataArray = data.Split(new char[] { ',' });Di2015NewLine  byte[] dataByte = new byte[dataArray.Length];Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < dataArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    dataByte[i] = Convert.ToByte(dataArray[i]);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  rsa.FromXmlString(_privateKey);Di2015NewLine  var decryptedByte = rsa.Decrypt(dataByte, false);Di2015NewLine  return _encoder.GetString(decryptedByte);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string Encrypt(string data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var rsa = new RSACryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine  rsa.FromXmlString(_publicKey);Di2015NewLine  var dataToEncrypt = _encoder.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLine  var encryptedByteArray = rsa.Encrypt(dataToEncrypt, false).ToArray();Di2015NewLine  var length = encryptedByteArray.Count();Di2015NewLine  var item = 0;Di2015NewLine  var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine  foreach (var x in encryptedByteArray)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    item++;Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(x);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (item < length)Di2015NewLine      sb.Append(",");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

DefaultValueHandling.Ignore)Di2015NewLine                & DefaultValueHandling.Ignore) != 0;Di2015NewLine        if (isDefaultValueIgnoredDi2015NewLine                && !typeof(string).IsAssignableFrom(property.PropertyType)Di2015NewLine                && typeof(IEnumerable).IsAssignableFrom(property.PropertyType)) {Di2015NewLine            var memberProp = member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine            var memberField = member as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine            Predicate<object> newShouldSerialize = obj => {Di2015NewLine                object value = memberProp != nullDi2015NewLine                    ? memberProp.GetValue(obj)Di2015NewLine                    : memberField != nullDi2015NewLine                    ? memberField.GetValue(obj)Di2015NewLine                    : null;Di2015NewLine                var collection = value as ICollection;Di2015NewLine                return collection == null || collection.Count != 0;Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            Predicate<object> oldShouldSerialize = property.ShouldSerialize;Di2015NewLine            property.ShouldSerialize = oldShouldSerialize != nullDi2015NewLine                ? o => oldShouldSerialize(o) && newShouldSerialize(o)Di2015NewLine                : newShouldSerialize;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return property;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18488751Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass FooMultitonDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Dictionary<object, FooMultiton> _instances =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<object, FooMultiton>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this is the classic good old singleton trick (prevent direct instantiation)Di2015NewLine    private FooMultiton()Di2015NewLine    { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // you can also have private concrete implementations, Di2015NewLine    // invisible to the outside worldDi2015NewLine    private class ConcreteFooMultitonOne : FooMultitonDi2015NewLine    { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static FooMultiton GetInstance(object key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_instances) Di2015NewLine        {   Di2015NewLine            FooMultiton instance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if it doesn't exist, create it and store itDi2015NewLine            if (!_instances.TryGetValue(key, out instance))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // at this point, you can create a derived class instanceDi2015NewLine                instance = new ConcreteFooMultitonOne();Di2015NewLine                _instances.Add(key, instance);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // always return the same ("singleton") instance for this keyDi2015NewLine            return instance;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18489036Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> CommonSubset<T>Di2015NewLine          (this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences, Di2015NewLine           EqualityComparer<T> comparer = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (sequences == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("sequences");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Enumerator<T> enumerator = sequences.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    if(enumerator.GetNext() == false)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Sequences must not be empty", "sequences");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> first = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine    HashSet<T> commonSubset = new HashSet<T>(first);Di2015NewLine    while(enumerator.GetNext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var nextSequence = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine        var toRemove = commonSubset.Except(nextSequence, comparer ?? EqualityComparer<T>.Default).ToList();Di2015NewLine        foreach(var r in toRemove)Di2015NewLine            commonSubset.Remove(r);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return commonSubset;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18489690Di2015UniqueSeparator    ...Di2015NewLine    private string GetBlobDataString(IDataReader openedDataReader, int columnIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder data = new StringBuilder(20000);Di2015NewLine        char[] buffer = new char[1000];Di2015NewLine        long startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long dataReceivedCount = openedDataReader.GetChars(columnIndex, startIndex, buffer, 0, 1000);Di2015NewLine        data.Append(buffer, 0, (int)dataReceivedCount);Di2015NewLine        while (dataReceivedCount == 1000)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            startIndex += 1000;Di2015NewLine            dataReceivedCount = openedDataReader.GetChars(columnIndex, startIndex, buffer, 0, 1000);Di2015NewLine            data.Append(buffer, 0, (int)dataReceivedCount);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return data.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private byte[] GetBlobDataBinary(IDataReader openedDataReader, int columnIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream data = new MemoryStream(20000);Di2015NewLine        BinaryWriter dataWriter = new BinaryWriter(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[1000];Di2015NewLine        long startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long dataReceivedCount = openedDataReader.GetBytes(columnIndex, startIndex, buffer, 0, 1000);Di2015NewLine        dataWriter.Write(buffer, 0, (int)dataReceivedCount);Di2015NewLine        while (dataReceivedCount == 1000)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            startIndex += 1000;Di2015NewLine            dataReceivedCount = openedDataReader.GetBytes(columnIndex, startIndex, buffer, 0, 1000);Di2015NewLine            dataWriter.Write(buffer, 0, (int)dataReceivedCount);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        data.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        return data.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18491990Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Replace(Di2015NewLine    string inputDi2015NewLine,   ref int posDi2015NewLine,   IDictionary<string,string> varsDi2015NewLine,   bool stopOnClose = falseDi2015NewLine) {Di2015NewLine    var res = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    while (pos != input.Length) {Di2015NewLine        switch (input[pos]) {Di2015NewLine            case '\\\\':Di2015NewLine                pos++;Di2015NewLine                if (pos != input.Length) {Di2015NewLine                    res.Append(input[pos++]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ')':Di2015NewLine                if (stopOnClose) {Di2015NewLine                    return res.ToString();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                res.Append(')');Di2015NewLine                pos++;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '$':Di2015NewLine                pos++;Di2015NewLine                if (pos != input.Length && input[pos] == '(') {Di2015NewLine                    pos++;Di2015NewLine                    var name = Replace(input, ref pos, vars, true);Di2015NewLine                    string replacement;Di2015NewLine                    if (vars.TryGetValue(name, out replacement)) {Di2015NewLine                        res.Append(replacement);Di2015NewLine                    } else {Di2015NewLine                        res.Append("<UNKNOWN:");Di2015NewLine                        res.Append(name);Di2015NewLine                        res.Append(">");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    pos++;Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    res.Append('$');Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                res.Append(input[pos++]);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return 0;Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(Replace(input, ref pos, vars));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18496881Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string ParseValue(string value, string trimFromStart, string trimFromEnd)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int valueLength = value.Length;Di2015NewLine    int trimStartAmount = value.StartsWith(trimFromStart) Di2015NewLine        ? trimFromStart.Length Di2015NewLine        : 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int trimFromEndIndex = valueLength;Di2015NewLine    int trimEndAmount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value.EndsWith(trimFromEnd))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        trimFromEndIndex = valueLength - trimFromEnd.Length;Di2015NewLine        trimEndAmount = trimFromEnd.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (trimStartAmount >= trimFromEndIndex)Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (trimStartAmount == 0 && trimEndAmount == 0)Di2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return value.Substring(trimStartAmount, valueLength - trimStartAmount - trimEndAmount);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

You can also add it as parametersDi2015NewLine        double aspectRatio_X = 4;Di2015NewLine        double aspectRatio_Y = 3;                        Di2015NewLine        double targetHeight = Convert.ToDouble(width) / (aspectRatio_X / aspectRatio_Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        img = cropImg(img);Di2015NewLine        Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(width, (int)targetHeight);Di2015NewLine        Graphics grp = Graphics.FromImage(bmp);Di2015NewLine        grp.DrawImage(img, new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height), new Rectangle(0, 0, img.Width, img.Height), GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine        return (Image)bmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Image cropImg(Image img)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // 4:3 Aspect Ratio. You can also add it as parametersDi2015NewLine        double aspectRatio_X = 4;Di2015NewLine        double aspectRatio_Y = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double imgWidth = Convert.ToDouble(img.Width);Di2015NewLine        double imgHeight = Convert.ToDouble(img.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (imgWidth / imgHeight > (aspectRatio_X / aspectRatio_Y))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double extraWidth = imgWidth - (imgHeight * (aspectRatio_X / aspectRatio_Y));Di2015NewLine            double cropStartFrom = extraWidth / 2;Di2015NewLine            Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap((int)(img.Width - extraWidth), img.Height);Di2015NewLine            Graphics grp = Graphics.FromImage(bmp);                                                Di2015NewLine            grp.DrawImage(img, new Rectangle(0, 0, (int)(img.Width - extraWidth), img.Height), new Rectangle((int)cropStartFrom, 0, (int)(imgWidth - extraWidth), img.Height), GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine            return (Image)bmp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pictureBox2.Image = resizeImg(pictureBox1.Image, 60);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18498404Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public Form1()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (backgroundWorker1.IsBusy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      label1.Text = "Reset!";Di2015NewLine      backgroundWorker1.CancelAsync();Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    backgroundWorker1.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void backgroundWorker1_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    label1.InvokeIfRequired(() => label1.Text = "Gettin busy");Di2015NewLine    System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(5000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      backgroundWorker1.ReportProgress(i*10);Di2015NewLine      System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void backgroundWorker1_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    label1.InvokeIfRequired(() => label1.Text = "Done");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void backgroundWorker1_ProgressChanged(object sender, ProgressChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    label1.InvokeIfRequired(() => label1.Text = string.Format("{0}% done", e.ProgressPercentage));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class InvokeExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static void InvokeIfRequired(this ISynchronizeInvoke control, MethodInvoker action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (control.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      control.Invoke(action, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      action();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18498761Di2015UniqueSeparator// Ignore all whitespace within the expression.Di2015NewLineinfixExp = Regex.Replace(infixExp, @"\\s+", String.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Seperate the expression based on the tokens (, ), +, -, Di2015NewLine// *, /, and ignore any of the empty Strings that are addedDi2015NewLine// due to duplicates.Di2015NewLinestring[] substrings = Regex.Split(infixExp, @"([()+*/-])");Di2015NewLinesubstrings = substrings.Where(s => s != String.Empty).ToArray();Di2015NewLine
18498761Di2015UniqueSeparatorsubstrings
18498795Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string asciiOctets2String( byte[] bytes )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine  foreach ( char c in bytes.Select( b => (char) b ) )Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    switch ( c )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0000' : sb.Append("<NUL>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0001' : sb.Append("<SOH>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0002' : sb.Append("<STX>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0003' : sb.Append("<ETX>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0004' : sb.Append("<EOT>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0005' : sb.Append("<ENQ>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0006' : sb.Append("<ACK>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0007' : sb.Append("<BEL>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0008' : sb.Append("<BS>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0009' : sb.Append("<HT>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u000A' : sb.Append("<LF>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u000B' : sb.Append("<VT>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u000C' : sb.Append("<FF>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u000D' : sb.Append("<CR>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u000E' : sb.Append("<SO>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u000F' : sb.Append("<SI>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0010' : sb.Append("<DLE>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0011' : sb.Append("<DC1>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0012' : sb.Append("<DC2>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0013' : sb.Append("<DC3>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0014' : sb.Append("<DC4>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0015' : sb.Append("<NAK>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0016' : sb.Append("<SYN>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0017' : sb.Append("<ETB>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0018' : sb.Append("<CAN>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u0019' : sb.Append("<EM>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u001A' : sb.Append("<SUB>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u001B' : sb.Append("<ESC>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u001C' : sb.Append("<FS>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u001D' : sb.Append("<GS>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u001E' : sb.Append("<RS>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u001F' : sb.Append("<US>" ) ; break ;Di2015NewLine    case '\\u007F' : sb.Append("<DEL>") ; break ;Di2015NewLine    default :Di2015NewLine      if ( c > '\\u007F' )Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat( @"\\u{0:X4}" , (ushort)c ) ; // in ASCII, any octet in the range 0x80-0xFF doesn't have a character glyph associated with itDi2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append( c ) ;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      break ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return sb.ToString() ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18498795Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string[] controlChars =Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  "<NUL>" , "<SOH>" , "<STX>" , "<ETX>" ,Di2015NewLine  "<EOT>" , "<ENQ>" , "<ACK>" , "<BEL>" ,Di2015NewLine  "<BS>"  , "<HT>"  , "<LF>"  , "<VT>"  ,Di2015NewLine  "<FF>"  , "<CR>"  , "<SO>"  , "<SI>"  ,Di2015NewLine  "<DLE>" , "<DC1>" , "<DC2>" , "<DC3>" ,Di2015NewLine  "<DC4>" , "<NAK>" , "<SYN>" , "<ETB>" ,Di2015NewLine  "<CAN>" , "<EM>"  , "<SUB>" , "<ESC>" ,Di2015NewLine  "<FS>"  , "<GS>"  , "<RS>"  , "<US>"  ,Di2015NewLine} ;Di2015NewLinestatic string asciiOctets2String( byte[] bytes )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine  foreach ( char c in bytes.Select( b => (char) b ) )Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if      ( c <  '\\u0020' ) { sb.Append( controlChars[c] ) ; }Di2015NewLine    else if ( c == '\\u007F' ) { sb.Append( "<DEL>"         ) ; }Di2015NewLine    else if ( c >  '\\u007F' ) { sb.AppendFormat( @"\\u{0:X4}" , (ushort)c ) ; }Di2015NewLine    else /* 0x20-0x7E */      { sb.Append( c ) ; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return sb.ToString() ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18501418Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string AskAPI(string uri, int millis)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var task = new Task<string>(() => api.Query(uri)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        task.Start();Di2015NewLine        task.Wait(millis);Di2015NewLine        if (!task.IsCompleted) throw new TimeoutException();Di2015NewLine        return task.Result;Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18501418Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic T Await<T>(Func<T> fun, int millis)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var cancel = new CancellationTokenSource(millis))Di2015NewLine    using (var task = new Task<T>(() =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T result = default(T);Di2015NewLine        var thread = new Thread(() => result = fun());Di2015NewLine        thread.Start();Di2015NewLine        while (!cancel.Token.IsCancellationRequested && thread.IsAlive) ; // Wait for a sign from aboveDi2015NewLine        thread.Abort();Di2015NewLine        cancel.Token.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }, cancel.Token))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        task.Start();Di2015NewLine        task.Wait(millis);Di2015NewLine        cancel.Cancel();Di2015NewLine        if (!task.IsCompleted) throw new TimeoutException();Di2015NewLine        return task.Result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine     if (s1 == "")Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("s1 equals empty string.");Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Use for .NET Framework 1.0 and 1.1. 18508388Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string SubmitRequest(string url)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest webRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine    webRequest.Timeout = System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite;Di2015NewLine    webRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    webRequest.AutomaticDecompression = DecompressionMethods.GZip | DecompressionMethods.Deflate;Di2015NewLine    webRequest.Headers.Add("Accept-Encoding", "gzip, deflate");Di2015NewLine    webRequest.ServicePoint.SetTcpKeepAlive(true, 600000, 1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    X509Certificate2 cert = null;Di2015NewLine    ServicePointManager.ServerCertificateValidationCallback += ValidateRemoteCertificate;Di2015NewLine    cert = FindCertificate(StoreLocation.CurrentUser, StoreName.My, X509FindType.FindByIssuerName, "Internal CA");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (cert != null)Di2015NewLine        webRequest.ClientCertificates.Add(cert);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String boundary = Guid.NewGuid().ToString();Di2015NewLine    webRequest.ContentType = @"multipart/form-data; boundary=""" + boundary + @"""";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] postData = GetPostData(boundary);Di2015NewLine    webRequest.ContentLength = postData.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stream dataStream = webRequest.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine    dataStream.Write(postData, 0, postData.Length);Di2015NewLine    dataStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String response;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (HttpWebResponse webResponse = (HttpWebResponse)(webRequest.GetResponse()))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        statusCode = webResponse.StatusCode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (HttpError)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            webResponse.Close();Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("Error " + webResponse.StatusCode + " with server " + url + " :" + webResponse.StatusDescription);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (Stream responseStream = webResponse.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (StreamReader responseStreamReader = new StreamReader(responseStream, System.Text.Encoding.ASCII))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                response = responseStreamReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                responseStreamReader.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            responseStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        webResponse.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return response;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18508388Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate byte[] GetPostData(String boundary)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder mimeMessage = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    NameValueCollection postData = new NameValueCollection();Di2015NewLine    postData.Add("request", txtRequest.Text);Di2015NewLine    postData.Add("user_id", txtUserName.Text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String parameter;Di2015NewLine    foreach (string name in postData.AllKeys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        parameter = postData[name];Di2015NewLine        mimeMessage.Append("--" + boundary + "\\r\\n" + @"Content-Disposition: form-data; name=""" + name + @"""" + "\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine            "Content-Type: text/xml" + "\\r\\n" + "\\r\\n" + parameter + "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    mimeMessage.Append("--" + boundary + "--" + "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(mimeMessage.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        this.opn=opn;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Execute()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        opn.PerformOperations();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} 18513956Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void OnReceive(object sender, SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineTOP:Di2015NewLine    if (e != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int length = e.BytesTransferred;Di2015NewLine        if (length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FireBytesReceivedFrom(Datagram, length, (IPEndPoint)e.RemoteEndPoint);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        e.Dispose(); // could possibly reuse the args?Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Socket s = Socket;Di2015NewLine    if (s != null && RemoteEndPoint != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        e = new SocketAsyncEventArgs();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            e.RemoteEndPoint = RemoteEndPoint;Di2015NewLine            e.SetBuffer(Datagram, 0, Datagram.Length); // don't allocate a new buffer every timeDi2015NewLine            e.Completed += OnReceive;Di2015NewLine            // this uses the fast IO completion port stuff made available in .NET 3.5; it's supposedly better than the socket selector or the old Begin/End methodsDi2015NewLine            if (!s.ReceiveFromAsync(e)) // returns synchronously if data is already thereDi2015NewLine                goto TOP; // using GOTO to avoid overflowing the stackDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ObjectDisposedException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this is expected after a disconnectDi2015NewLine            e.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            Logger.Info("UDP Client Receive was disconnected.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Logger.Error("Unexpected UDP Client Receive disconnect.", ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18514441Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static ProcessStartInfo BindCertToPort(int iPort, X509Certificate2 certificate, bool bRemove = false)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string strAction = null;Di2015NewLine    string strExtraArguments = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo startInfo = new System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo();Di2015NewLine    startInfo.WindowStyle = System.Diagnostics.ProcessWindowStyle.Hidden;Di2015NewLine    startInfo.FileName = Path.Combine(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.SystemX86), "netsh.exe");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (bRemove)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        strAction = "delete";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        strAction = "add";Di2015NewLine        strExtraArguments = string.Format(" certhash={0} appid={{{1}}}", certificate.Thumbprint, Guid.NewGuid());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    startInfo.Arguments = string.Format("http {0} sslcert ipport=0.0.0.0:{1}{2}", strAction, iPort, strExtraArguments);Di2015NewLine    startInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine    startInfo.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine    startInfo.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return startInfo;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18516596Di2015UniqueSeparatorcolorToSearch
18516596Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected void search_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StreamReader sr = new StreamReader("colorCode.txt");Di2015NewLine    string line = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char []colorSeparator =  { ':' } ;Di2015NewLine    string []colors ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char []colorCodeSeparator =  { '#' } ;Di2015NewLine    string []codeAndColor ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool found ;Di2015NewLine    string colorToSearch ;Di2015NewLine    string colorCode ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    colorToSearch  = "White" ;Di2015NewLine    found = false ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while(!found && (line =sr.ReadLine()) !=null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //separate the content of the file "#FFFFFF"#White: "#FF0000"#Red: using ":" as separatorDi2015NewLine        colors = line.Split(colorSeparator) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(string color in colors)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            codeAndColor = colors.Split(colorCodeSeparator) ;Di2015NewLine            //codeAndColor[0] now contains the colorCode "#FFFFFF"Di2015NewLine            //codeAndColor[1] contains the name of the color "White"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //check if the name of the color in the file contains the colorToSearch allowing for case insensitiveDi2015NewLine            if(codeAndColor[1].ToUpper().Contains(colorToSearch.ToUpper()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                colorCode = codeAndColor[0].Substring(1,7) ; //the 1 is to skipe the initial double quote, 7 is the number of caracter to takeDi2015NewLine                found = true ;Di2015NewLine                //stop the foreach loopDi2015NewLine                break ;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18523122Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IntPtr WindowProcedureHook( IntPtr hwnd, int msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam, ref bool handled ) {Di2015NewLine    if ( msg == (int) WinMessages.WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING ) {Di2015NewLine        if ( IsDocked && !IsDragging ) {Di2015NewLine            WindowPos pos = (WindowPos) Marshal.PtrToStructure( lParam, typeof( WindowPos ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Keep this window in its docked position.Di2015NewLine            pos.x  = (int) DockedPosition.X;Di2015NewLine            pos.y  = (int) DockedPosition.Y;Di2015NewLine            pos.cx = (int) DockedSize.Width;Di2015NewLine            pos.cy = (int) DockedSize.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Marshal.StructureToPtr( pos, lParam, false );Di2015NewLine            handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } else if ( msg == CallbackId ) {Di2015NewLine        if ( wParam.ToInt32() == (int) ABNotify.ABN_WINDOWPOSCHANGED ) {Di2015NewLine            SetDockedPosition( Window, this, true );Di2015NewLine            handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18523948Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static async Task<string> WebClientAsync(string URI, NetworkCredential Creds = null, Dictionary.FantasySite Site = Dictionary.FantasySite.Other)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // If (Creds == null) removed, you must return a task or throw an exception.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //attempt to get the web pageDi2015NewLine    HttpClient client = new HttpClient(); //create clientDi2015NewLine    HttpResponseMessage response = await client.GetAsync(URI);  //get responseDi2015NewLine    response.EnsureSuccessStatusCode(); //ensure the response is good (or throw Exception)Di2015NewLine    return await response.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();  //return the string backDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal static async Task<string> WebClientRetryAsync(string URI, NetworkCredential Creds = null, Dictionary.FantasySite Site = Dictionary.FantasySite.Other)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // assumes you have .NET 4.5, otherwise save exception.Di2015NewLine    // uses System.Runtime.ExceptionServices;Di2015NewLine    ExceptionDispatchInfo exceptionDispatchInfo = null; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < Dictionary.WEB_PAGE_ATTEMPTS; i++)  //Attempt to get the webpage x timesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print(string.Format("WebClientRetryAsync attempt {0} for {1}", i + 1, URI));Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var webPage = await WebClientAsync(URI, Creds, Site);Di2015NewLine            return webPage;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // save exception so it can be rethrown.Di2015NewLine            exceptionDispatchInfo = ExceptionDispatchInfo.Capture(ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Edit: also need to do an async wait (no thread.sleep):Di2015NewLine        if (i < Dictionary.WEB_PAGE_ATTEMPTS - 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //wait some time before retrying just in case we are too busyDi2015NewLine            //Start wait at 0 for first time and multiply with each successive failure to slow down process by multiplying by i squaredDi2015NewLine            await Task.Delay(Wait.Next(i * i * Dictionary.RETRY_WAIT_MS));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(exceptionDispatchInfo != null); // shouldn't be null if we get here.Di2015NewLine    exceptionDispatchInfo.Throw();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18530358Di2015UniqueSeparator    public B Convert<A, B>(A element) where B : A, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //get the interface's properties that implement both a getter and a setterDi2015NewLine        IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> properties = typeof(A)Di2015NewLine            .GetProperties()Di2015NewLine            .Where(property => property.CanRead && property.CanWrite).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //create new objectDi2015NewLine        B b = new B();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //copy the property values to the new objectDi2015NewLine        foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //read valueDi2015NewLine            object value = property.GetValue(element);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //set valueDi2015NewLine            property.SetValue(b, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18532984Di2015UniqueSeparator// The main dictionaryDi2015NewLinevar dict = new Dictionary<string, List<TimeInterval>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The temporary dictionary where new keys are addedDi2015NewLinevar next = new Dictionary<string, List<TimeInterval>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// current will contain dict or the various instances of nextDi2015NewLine// (multiple new Dictionary<string, List<TimeInterval>>(); can Di2015NewLine// be created)Di2015NewLinevar current = dict;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var kv in current)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if necessaryDi2015NewLine        List<TimeInterval> value = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // We add items only to next, that will be processedDi2015NewLine        // in the next while (true) cycleDi2015NewLine        next.Add("NewKey", value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (next.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Nothing was added in this cycle, we have finishedDi2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var kv in next)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dict.Add(kv.Key, kv.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    current = next;Di2015NewLine    next = new Dictionary<string, List<TimeInterval>>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18536297Di2015UniqueSeparatorGroupWhile
18536297Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<DateTime> LoneDates(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<DateTime> dates, TimeSpan threshold)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return dates.OrderBy(x => x)Di2015NewLine        .GroupWhile((previous, current) => current - previous <= threshold)Di2015NewLine        .Select(group => group.First());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18536297Di2015UniqueSeparatorGroupWhile
18536297Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GroupWhile<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<T> list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (predicate(previous, iterator.Current))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                list.Add(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return list;Di2015NewLine                list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18536442Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void traverseBmp(Action<int, int> doIt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < GridSize.X; x++) //For every value in the height of the gridDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < GridSize.Y; y++)//and every value in the width of the gridDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                doIt(x, y);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DrawSim() //Creates the bitmap of the grid which is dispalyed on the screen and scales it upDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(GridSize.X, GridSize.Y); //Creates the bitmap specifying the width and height of itDi2015NewLine        //These two for loops loop through every part of the grid:Di2015NewLine        traverseBmp((x, y) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Color Colour = Color.Black;Di2015NewLine                    //Creates a new color used to set the pixel colour on the bitmap (Empty space is black)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (Entity e in Entity.GetEntitiesAt(x, y)) //For every entity a the current location...Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if ((e as Food) != null) //If it is Food, set the colour to greenDi2015NewLine                        Colour = Color.FromArgb(Colour.R, 255, Colour.B);Di2015NewLine                    else if ((e as Mitosis) != null) //If it is bacteria Mitosis, set the colour to blueDi2015NewLine                        Colour = Color.FromArgb(Colour.R, Colour.G, 255);Di2015NewLine                    else if ((e as Meiosis) != null) //If it is bacteria Meiosis, set the colour to goldDi2015NewLine                        Colour = Color.Gold;Di2015NewLine                    else //If it's none of these, the only entity left is the Virus, set the colour to redDi2015NewLine                        Colour = Color.FromArgb(255, Colour.G, Colour.B);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (AStar.Grid[x, y].IsWall) //If that location is a wall, set the colour to whiteDi2015NewLine                    Colour = Color.White;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bmp.SetPixel(x, y, Colour); //Set the pixel at position x and y to the colour chosen aboveDi2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Scales up the bitmap into a new bitmapDi2015NewLine        Bitmap bmpscale = new Bitmap(GridSize.X * ImageScale, GridSize.Y * ImageScale);Di2015NewLine        traverseBmp((x,y) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int sx = 0; sx < ImageScale; sx++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int sy = 0; sy < ImageScale; sy++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        bmpscale.SetPixel(((x*ImageScale) + sx), ((y*ImageScale) + sy), bmp.GetPixel(x, y));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.CreateGraphics().DrawImage(bmpscale, new Point(10, 10)); //Draws the bitmap image at set co-ordinates on the formDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

gmailAtomUrl = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string PasswordDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return password; }Di2015NewLine        set { password = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string UsernameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return username; }Di2015NewLine        set { username = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string ProxyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return proxy; }Di2015NewLine        set { proxy = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public GmailHandler(string _Username, string _Password, string _GmailAtomUrl, string _proxy = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Username = _Username;Di2015NewLine        Password = _Password;Di2015NewLine        GmailAtomUrl = _GmailAtomUrl;Di2015NewLine        Proxy = _proxy;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public GmailHandler(string _Username, string _Password, string _proxy = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Username = _Username;Di2015NewLine        Password = _Password;Di2015NewLine        GmailAtomUrl = "https://mail.google.com/mail/feed/atom";Di2015NewLine        Proxy = _proxy;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public XmlDocument GetGmailAtom()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[8192];Di2015NewLine        int byteCount = 0;Di2015NewLine        XmlDocument _feedXml = null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Text.StringBuilder sBuilder = new System.Text.StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            WebRequest webRequest = WebRequest.Create(GmailAtomUrl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(!String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(Proxy))Di2015NewLine            webRequest.Proxy = new WebProxy(Proxy, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            webRequest.PreAuthenticate = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            System.Net.NetworkCredential credentials = new NetworkCredential(this.Username, this.Password);Di2015NewLine            webRequest.Credentials = credentials;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WebResponse webResponse = webRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine            Stream stream = webResponse.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while ((byteCount = stream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                sBuilder.Append(System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetString(buffer, 0, byteCount));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _feedXml = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine            _feedXml.LoadXml(sBuilder.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //add error handlingDi2015NewLine            throw ex;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return _feedXml;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18537587Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CallCenterActivityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public CallCenterActivity(string callActivity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AgentStistics = new List<AgentStatistic>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using(var reader = new StringReader(callActivity))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             ActivityDate = 18543063Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CircularList<T> {Di2015NewLine    private int start, end, count, mask;Di2015NewLine    private T[] items;Di2015NewLine    public CircularList() : this(8) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CircularList(int capacity) {Di2015NewLine        int size = IsPowerOf2(capacity) ? capacity : PowerOf2Ceiling(capacity);Di2015NewLine        this.items = new T[size];Di2015NewLine        this.start = this.end = this.count = 0;Di2015NewLine        this.mask = size - 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(T item) {Di2015NewLine        if (this.count == 0) {Di2015NewLine            this.items[0] = item;Di2015NewLine            this.start = this.end = 0;Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            this.items[++this.end] = item;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.count++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Prepend(T item) {Di2015NewLine        if (this.count == 0) {Di2015NewLine            this.items[0] = item;Di2015NewLine            this.start = this.end = 0;Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            this.start--;Di2015NewLine            if (this.start < 0) this.start = this.items.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine            this.items[this.start] = item;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.count++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T this[int index] {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            if ((index < 0) || (index >= this.count)) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine            return this.items[(index + this.start) & this.mask]; // (index + start) % lengthDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        set {Di2015NewLine            if ((index < 0) || (index >= this.count)) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine            this.items[(index + this.start) & this.mask] = value; // (index + start) % lengthDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool IsPowerOf2(int value) {Di2015NewLine        return (value > 0) && ((value & (value - 1)) == 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private int PowerOf2Ceiling(int value) {Di2015NewLine        if (value < 0) return 1;Di2015NewLine        switch (value) {Di2015NewLine            case 0:Di2015NewLine            case 1: return 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        value--;Di2015NewLine        value |= value >> 1;Di2015NewLine        value |= value >> 2;Di2015NewLine        value |= value >> 4;Di2015NewLine        value |= value >> 8;Di2015NewLine        return unchecked((value | (value >> 16)) + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18543149Di2015UniqueSeparatorOems
18543149Di2015UniqueSeparator// Original list of OEM objectsDi2015NewLineList<asbs.OEM> Oems = new List<asbs.OEM>();Di2015NewLineOems.Add(new asbs.OEM() { OemID = 7 });Di2015NewLineOems.Add(new asbs.OEM() { OemID = 8 });Di2015NewLineOems.Add(new asbs.OEM() { OemID = 27 });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a new dictionary from the list, using the OemIDs as keysDi2015NewLineDictionary<int, asbs.OEM> dict = Oems.ToDictionary(o => o.OemID);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now serialize the dictionaryDi2015NewLinestring json = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(dict, Formatting.Indented);Di2015NewLine

18551053Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Helper class for SqlDataReader, which allows for the calling code to retrieve a value in a generic fashion.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class SqlReaderHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static bool IsNullableType(Type theValueType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (theValueType.IsGenericType && theValueType.GetGenericTypeDefinition().Equals(typeof(Nullable<>)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns the value, of type T, from the SqlDataReader, accounting for both generic and non-generic types.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">T, type applied</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="theReader">The SqlDataReader object that queried the database</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="theColumnName">The column of data to retrieve a value from</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>T, type applied; default value of type if database value is null</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T GetValue<T>(this SqlDataReader theReader, string theColumnName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Read the value out of the reader by string (column name); returns objectDi2015NewLine        object theValue = theReader[theColumnName];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Cast to the generic type applied to this method (i.e. int?)Di2015NewLine        Type theValueType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check for null value from the databaseDi2015NewLine        if (DBNull.Value != theValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We have a null, do we have a nullable type for T?Di2015NewLine            if (!IsNullableType(theValueType))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // No, this is not a nullable type so just change the value's type from object to TDi2015NewLine                return (T)Convert.ChangeType(theValue, theValueType);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Yes, this is a nullable type so change the value's type from object to the underlying type of TDi2015NewLine                NullableConverter theNullableConverter = new NullableConverter(theValueType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return (T)Convert.ChangeType(theValue, theNullableConverter.UnderlyingType);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The value was null in the database, so return the default value for T; this will vary based on what T is (i.e. int has a default of 0)Di2015NewLine        return default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18551053Di2015UniqueSeparatoryourSqlReaderObject.GetValue<int?>("SOME_ID_COLUMN");Di2015NewLineyourSqlReaderObject.GetValue<string>("SOME_VALUE_COLUMN");Di2015NewLine

18551175Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int Size = 100000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Running at {0} bits", IntPtr.Size * 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Tester<string>();Di2015NewLine        Tester<double>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Tester<T>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var array = new object[Size];Di2015NewLine        long initialMemory = GC.GetTotalMemory(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < Size; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            array[i] = new T[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long finalMemory = GC.GetTotalMemory(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GC.KeepAlive(array);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long total = finalMemory - initialMemory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Size of each {0}[]: {1:0.000} bytes", typeof(T).Name,Di2015NewLine                          ((double)total) / Size);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18552834Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static T ParseStructure<T>(byte[] array, int offset) where T : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (array == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("array", "Input parameter cannot be null");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (array.Length - offset < Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(T)))Di2015NewLine            Array.Resize<byte>(ref array, Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(T)) + offset);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int arraySize = array.Length - offset;Di2015NewLine        T returnItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Allocate some unmanaged memory.Di2015NewLine        IntPtr buffer = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(arraySize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy the read byte array (byte[]) into the unmanaged memory block.Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(array, offset, buffer, arraySize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Marshal the unmanaged memory block to a structure.Di2015NewLine        returnItem = (T)Marshal.PtrToStructure(buffer, typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Free the unmanaged memory block.Di2015NewLine        Marshal.FreeHGlobal(buffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return returnItem;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
18552834Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static byte[] StructureToArray<T>(T structure) where T : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int objectSize = Marshal.SizeOf(structure);Di2015NewLine        byte[] result = new byte[objectSize];Di2015NewLine        IntPtr buffer = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(objectSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object dataStructure = (object)structure;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Marshal.StructureToPtr(dataStructure, buffer, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(buffer, result, 0, objectSize);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.FreeHGlobal(buffer);Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18553303Di2015UniqueSeparatorTo shuffle an array a of n elements (indices 0..n-1):Di2015NewLine  for i from n  1 downto 1 doDi2015NewLine   j ? random integer with 0  j  iDi2015NewLine   exchange a[j] and a[i]Di2015NewLine
18553303Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static List<T> Shuffle<T>(this List<T> original)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<T> lst = new List<T>(original);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = lst.Count - 1; i >= 1; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int j = rand.Next(0, i + 1);Di2015NewLine            T tmp = lst[j];Di2015NewLine            lst[j] = lst[i];Di2015NewLine            lst[i] = tmp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return lst;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18555365Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Tuple<IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable<T>> Diff<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> first, IEnumerable<T> second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var intersection = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    var onlyInFirst = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLine    var onlyInSecond = new HashSet<T>(second);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in first)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (onlyInSecond.Remove(item)) intersection.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        else onlyInFirst.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Tuple.Create<IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable<T>>Di2015NewLine        (intersection, onlyInFirst, onlyInSecond);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18560900Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string DecompressGzip(Stream input, Encoding e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (Ionic.Zlib.GZipStream decompressor = new Ionic.Zlib.GZipStream(input, Ionic.Zlib.CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int read = 0;Di2015NewLine            var buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (MemoryStream output = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while ((read = decompressor.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    output.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return e.GetString(output.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18562320Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override void Set(string name, string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (Logging.On)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Logging.PrintInfo(Logging.Web, this, "Set", name.ToString() + "=" + value.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (name == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("name");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (value == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("value");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (name == string.Empty)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(SR.GetString("net_emptystringcall", new object[] { "name" }), "name");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (value == string.Empty)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(SR.GetString("net_emptystringcall", new object[] { "value" }), "name");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!MimeBasePart.IsAscii(name, false))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new FormatException(SR.GetString("InvalidHeaderName"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!MimeBasePart.IsAnsi(value, false))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new FormatException(SR.GetString("InvalidHeaderValue"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    name = MailHeaderInfo.NormalizeCase(name);Di2015NewLine    MailHeaderID iD = MailHeaderInfo.GetID(name);Di2015NewLine    if ((iD == MailHeaderID.ContentType) && (this.part != null))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.part.ContentType.Set(value.ToLower(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture), this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if ((iD == MailHeaderID.ContentDisposition) && (this.part is MimePart))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ((MimePart) this.part).ContentDisposition.Set(value.ToLower(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture), this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Set(name, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void btnEqual_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double result = 0;Di2015NewLine        var first = Convert.ToDouble(num1);Di2015NewLine        var second = Convert.ToDouble(num2);Di2015NewLine        switch (op)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "+":Di2015NewLine                result = first + second;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "-":Di2015NewLine                result = first - second;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "/":Di2015NewLine                if (second != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result = first / second;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    errorLbl.Text = "You can't divide by zero... sign up for Math 100 please =)";Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "*":Di2015NewLine                result = first * second;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.PrintEquation(num1, op, num2, "=", result.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18568114Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void btnCompare_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Creating dummy data for testingDi2015NewLine        List<C1> L1 = new List<C1>() { new C1() { ID = 1 }, new C1() { ID = 4 } };Di2015NewLine        List<C2> L2 = new List<C2>() { new C2() { ID = 1 }, new C2() { ID = 2 } };Di2015NewLine        List<C3> L3 = new List<C3>() { new C3() { ID = 1 }, new C3() { ID = 2 }, new C3() { ID = 3 } };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Creating new list which will contain all the objects without duplicates based on ID columnDi2015NewLine        List<C4> L4 = new List<C4>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Firstly add all the objects from L1Di2015NewLine        L4.AddRange(from l1 in L1 select new C4() { ID = l1.ID });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Add only those objects from L2 which are not part of L1Di2015NewLine        L4.AddRange(from l22 in L2Di2015NewLine                    where !(from l4 in L4 join l2 in L2 on l4.ID equals l2.ID select new { ID = l4.ID }).Any(p => p.ID == l22.ID) Di2015NewLine                    select new C4() { ID = l22.ID });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Add only those objects from L3 which are not part of L1 and L2Di2015NewLine        L4.AddRange(from l33 in L3Di2015NewLine                    where !(from l4 in L4 join l3 in L3 on l4.ID equals l3.ID select new { ID = l4.ID }).Any(p => p.ID == l33.ID)Di2015NewLine                    select new C4() { ID = l33.ID });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //L4 will now contain all IDs without duplicatesDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class C1Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int ID { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //will contain other propertiesDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class C2Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int ID { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //will contain other propertiesDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class C3Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int ID { get;
