18571709Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class FileUploadDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static char DirSeparator = System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar;Di2015NewLine        public static string FilesPath = HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath("~\\\\Content" + DirSeparator + "Uploads" + DirSeparator);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string UploadFile(HttpPostedFileBase file)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check if we have a fileDi2015NewLine            if (null == file) return "";Di2015NewLine            // Make sure the file has contentDi2015NewLine            if (!(file.ContentLength > 0)) return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string fileName =DateTime.Now.Millisecond+ file.FileName;Di2015NewLine            string fileExt = Path.GetExtension(file.FileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Make sure we were able to determine a proper extensionDi2015NewLine            if (null == fileExt) return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check if the directory we are saving to existsDi2015NewLine            if (!Directory.Exists(FilesPath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If it doesn't exist, create the directoryDi2015NewLine                Directory.CreateDirectory(FilesPath);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Set our full path for savingDi2015NewLine            string path = FilesPath + DirSeparator + fileName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save our fileDi2015NewLine            file.SaveAs(Path.GetFullPath(path));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save our thumbnail as wellDi2015NewLine            ResizeImage(file, 70, 70);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return the filenameDi2015NewLine            return fileName;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void DeleteFile(string fileName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Don't do anything if there is no nameDi2015NewLine            if (fileName.Length == 0) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Set our full path for deletingDi2015NewLine            string path = FilesPath + DirSeparator + fileName;Di2015NewLine            string thumbPath = FilesPath + DirSeparator + "Thumbnails" + DirSeparator + fileName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RemoveFile(path);Di2015NewLine            RemoveFile(thumbPath);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void RemoveFile(string path)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check if our file existsDi2015NewLine            if (File.Exists(Path.GetFullPath(path)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Delete our fileDi2015NewLine                File.Delete(Path.GetFullPath(path));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void ResizeImage(HttpPostedFileBase file, int width, int height)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string thumbnailDirectory = String.Format(@"{0}{1}{2}", FilesPath, DirSeparator, "Thumbnails");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check if the directory we are saving to existsDi2015NewLine            if (!Directory.Exists(thumbnailDirectory))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If it doesn't exist, create the directoryDi2015NewLine                Directory.CreateDirectory(thumbnailDirectory);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Final path we will save our thumbnailDi2015NewLine            string imagePath = String.Format(@"{0}{1}{2}", thumbnailDirectory, DirSeparator, file.FileName);Di2015NewLine            // Create a stream to save the file to when we're done resizingDi2015NewLine            FileStream stream = new FileStream(Path.GetFullPath(imagePath), FileMode.OpenOrCreate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Convert our uploaded file to an imageDi2015NewLine            Image OrigImage = Image.FromStream(file.InputStream);Di2015NewLine            // Create a new bitmap with the size of our thumbnailDi2015NewLine            Bitmap TempBitmap = new Bitmap(width, height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create a new image that contains are quality informationDi2015NewLine            Graphics NewImage = Graphics.FromImage(TempBitmap);Di2015NewLine            NewImage.CompositingQuality = CompositingQuality.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine            NewImage.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine            NewImage.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create a rectangle and draw the imageDi2015NewLine            Rectangle imageRectangle = new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height);Di2015NewLine            NewImage.DrawImage(OrigImage, imageRectangle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save the final fileDi2015NewLine            TempBitmap.Save(stream, OrigImage.RawFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Clean up the resourcesDi2015NewLine            NewImage.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            TempBitmap.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            OrigImage.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            stream.Close();Di2015NewLine            stream.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18573522Di2015UniqueSeparatorasync Task DoNavigationAsync()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool documentComplete = false;Di2015NewLine    TaskCompletionSource<bool> onloadTcs = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    WebBrowserDocumentCompletedEventHandler handler = delegate Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (documentComplete)Di2015NewLine            return; // attach to onload only once per each DocumentDi2015NewLine        documentComplete = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // now subscribe to DOM onload eventDi2015NewLine        this.wb.Document.Window.AttachEventHandler("onload", delegateDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // each navigation has its own TaskCompletionSourceDi2015NewLine            if (onloadTcs.Task.IsCompleted)Di2015NewLine                return; // this should not be happeningDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // signal the completion of the page loadingDi2015NewLine            onloadTcs.SetResult(true);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // register DocumentCompleted handlerDi2015NewLine    this.wb.DocumentCompleted += handler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Navigate to http://www.example.com?i=1Di2015NewLine    documentComplete = false;Di2015NewLine    onloadTcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLine    this.wb.Navigate("http://www.example.com?i=1");Di2015NewLine    await onloadTcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    // the document has been fully loaded, you can access DOM hereDi2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show(this.wb.Document.Url.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Navigate to http://example.com?i=2Di2015NewLine    // could do the click() simulation insteadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    documentComplete = false;Di2015NewLine    onloadTcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>(); 18573522Di2015UniqueSeparatorasync/await
18573522Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask DoNavigationAsync()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // save the correct continuation context for Task.ContinueWithDi2015NewLine    var continueContext = TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext(); // this should not be happeningDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // signal the completion of the page loadingDi2015NewLine            onloadTcs.SetResult(true);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // register DocumentCompleted handlerDi2015NewLine    this.wb.DocumentCompleted += handler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Navigate to http://www.example.com?i=1Di2015NewLine    documentComplete = false;Di2015NewLine    onloadTcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLine    this.wb.Navigate("http://www.example.com?i=1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return onloadTcs.Task.ContinueWith(delegate Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // the document has been fully loaded, you can access DOM hereDi2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(this.wb.Document.Url.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Navigate to http://example.com?i=2Di2015NewLine        // could do the 'click()' simulation insteadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        documentComplete = false;Di2015NewLine        onloadTcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>(); 18576265Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid SendData(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // get the 4 bytes of a int value.Di2015NewLine    byte[] dataLength = BitConverter.GetBytes(data.Lenght);Di2015NewLine    // write the length to the stream.Di2015NewLine    stream.Write(dataLength, 0, dataLength.Length);Di2015NewLine    // write the data bytes.Di2015NewLine    stream.Write(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Receive()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // read 4 bytes from the stream.Di2015NewLine    ReadBuffer(buffer, 4);Di2015NewLine    // convert those 4 bytes to an int.Di2015NewLine    int dataLength = BitConverter.ToInt32(buffer, 0);Di2015NewLine    // read bytes with dataLength as count.Di2015NewLine    ReadBuffer(buffer, dataLength);    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// read until the right amount of bytes are read.Di2015NewLinevoid ReadBuffer(byte[] buffer, int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    int bytesNeeded = length;Di2015NewLine    int bytesReceived = 0;Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //read byte from clientDi2015NewLine        int bytesRead = stream.Read(buffer, bytesReceived, bytesNeeded-bytesReceived);Di2015NewLine        bytesReceived += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine        // merge byte array to another byte arrayDi2015NewLine    } while (bytesReceived < bytesNeeded);   //  <- you should do this async.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18577359Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static string GenerateString(int length, int minCharCode, int maxCharCode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var builder = new StringBuilder(length);Di2015NewLine        var random = new Random();Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            builder.Append((char) random.Next(minCharCode, maxCharCode));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18577359Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static string GenerateString(int length, IList<Range> ranges) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var builder = new StringBuilder(length);Di2015NewLine        var random = new Random();Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var rangeIndex = random.Next(ranges.Count);Di2015NewLine            var range = ranges[rangeIndex];Di2015NewLine            builder.Append((char)random.Next(range.Begin, range.End));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18577410Di2015UniqueSeparatorUnidecode
18577410Di2015UniqueSeparatorRemoveDiacritics
18577410Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing BinaryAnalysis.UnidecodeSharp;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string MakeSubdomain(string rawSubdomain, string baseDomain)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (baseDomain.Length + 2 > 253) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Base domain is already too long for a subdomain");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (baseDomain.Length == 0) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Invalid base domain");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sub = rawSubdomain.Unidecode();Di2015NewLine    sub = Regex.Replace(sub, @"[^a-zA-Z0-9-]+", "");Di2015NewLine    sub = Regex.Replace(sub, @"(^-+)|(-+$)", "");Di2015NewLine    sub = sub.ToLowerInvariant();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (sub.Length > 63) {Di2015NewLine        sub = sub.Substring(0, 63);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (sub.Length + baseDomain.Length + 1 > 253) {Di2015NewLine        sub = sub.Substring(0, 252 - baseDomain.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sub + "." + baseDomain;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18577850Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class IsDateAfterAttribute : ValidationAttribute, IClientValidatableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string testedPropertyName;Di2015NewLine    private readonly bool allowEqualDates;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IsDateAfterAttribute(string testedPropertyName, bool allowEqualDates = false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.testedPropertyName = testedPropertyName;Di2015NewLine        this.allowEqualDates = allowEqualDates;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ValidationResult IsValid(object value, ValidationContext validationContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var propertyTestedInfo = validationContext.ObjectType.GetProperty(this.testedPropertyName);Di2015NewLine        if (propertyTestedInfo == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new ValidationResult(string.Format("unknown property {0}", this.testedPropertyName));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var propertyTestedValue = propertyTestedInfo.GetValue(validationContext.ObjectInstance, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (value == null || !(value is DateTime))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ValidationResult.Success;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (propertyTestedValue == null || !(propertyTestedValue is DateTime))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ValidationResult.Success;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Compare valuesDi2015NewLine        if ((DateTime)value >= (DateTime)propertyTestedValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (this.allowEqualDates && value == propertyTestedValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return ValidationResult.Success;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if ((DateTime)value > (DateTime)propertyTestedValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return ValidationResult.Success;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new ValidationResult(FormatErrorMessage(validationContext.DisplayName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<ModelClientValidationRule> GetClientValidationRules(ModelMetadata metadata, ControllerContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rule = new ModelClientValidationRuleDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ErrorMessage = this.ErrorMessageString,Di2015NewLine            ValidationType = "isdateafter"Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        rule.ValidationParameters["propertytested"] = this.testedPropertyName;Di2015NewLine        rule.ValidationParameters["allowequaldates"] = this.allowEqualDates;Di2015NewLine        yield return rule;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

              ref IntPtr hNewToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Reverts to self.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        WindowsImpersonationContext impersonationContext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Track whether Dispose has been Logon32 Logon Interactive Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public const int INTERACTIVE_NUMBER = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Construction/Destruction/InitializationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Constructor of the impersonatorDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public Impersonator()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!ImpersonateUser(ConfigurationManager.AppSettings[ImpersonatingUserNameKey],Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine                //TODO: Log ExceptionDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Public MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Implement IDisposable.Di2015NewLine        // Do not make this method virtual.Di2015NewLine        // A derived class should not be able to override this method.Di2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine            // This object will be cleaned up by the Dispose method.Di2015NewLine            // Therefore, you should call GC.SupressFinalize toDi2015NewLine            // take this object off the finalization queueDi2015NewLine            // and prevent finalization code for this objectDi2015NewLine            // from executing a second time.Di2015NewLine            GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Impersonate User with the given user credentialsDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="userName">User Name</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="domain">Domain</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="password">Password</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>True if success, false otherwise</returns>Di2015NewLine        private bool ImpersonateUser(String userName, String domain, String password)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WindowsIdentity tempWindowsIdentity;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr token = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr tokenDuplicate = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (RevertToSelf())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (LogonUser(userName, domain, password, INTERACTIVE_NUMBER,Di2015NewLine                        DEFAULT_NUMBER, ref token) != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (DuplicateToken(token, 2, ref tokenDuplicate) != 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        tempWindowsIdentity = new WindowsIdentity(tokenDuplicate);Di2015NewLine                        impersonationContext = tempWindowsIdentity.Impersonate();Di2015NewLine                        if (impersonationContext != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            CloseHandle(token);Di2015NewLine                            CloseHandle(tokenDuplicate);Di2015NewLine                            return true;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (token != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Undo impersonationDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private void StopImpersonation()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            impersonationContext.Undo();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Protected MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios.Di2015NewLine        // If disposing equals true, the method has been called directlyDi2015NewLine        // or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resourcesDi2015NewLine        // can be disposed.Di2015NewLine        // If disposing equals false, the method has been called by theDi2015NewLine        // runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not referenceDi2015NewLine        // other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.Di2015NewLine        protected virtual void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check to see if Dispose has already been called.Di2015NewLine            if (!this.disposed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If disposing equals true, dispose all managedDi2015NewLine                // and unmanaged resources.Di2015NewLine                if (disposing)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    StopImpersonation();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Note disposing has been done.Di2015NewLine                disposed = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18583178Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static long PHash(String pValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double dAccumulator = 0;Di2015NewLine        byte[] asciiBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(pValue.Trim().ToUpper());Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < asciiBytes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((i & 1) == 1)Di2015NewLine                dAccumulator = Math.Cos(dAccumulator + (double)asciiBytes[i]);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                dAccumulator = Math.Sin(dAccumulator + (double)asciiBytes[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        dAccumulator = dAccumulator * Math.Pow(10,9);Di2015NewLine        return (long)dAccumulator;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

node.Operand;Di2015NewLine                var stringConvertMethod = typeof(SqlFunctions).GetMethod("StringConvert", new Type[] { typeof(double?) });Di2015NewLine                var trimMethod = Di2015NewLine    0xe70e, 0xf687, 0xc41c, 0xd595, 0xa12a, 0xb0a3, 0x8238, 0x93b1, Di2015NewLine    0x6b46, 0x7acf, 0x4854, 0x59dd, 0x2d62, 0x3ceb, 0x0e70, 0x1ff9, Di2015NewLine    0xf78f, 0xe606, compute_fcs(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return compute_fcs(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic ushort compute_fcs(byte[] data, int start, int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ushort fcs = 0xFFFF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int end = start + length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = start; i < end; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fcs = (ushort)(((ushort)(fcs >> 8)) ^ fcstab[(fcs ^ data[i]) & 0xFF]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (ushort)(~fcs);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] pattern = new byte[] { 0x02, 0x07, 0x01, 0x03, 0x01, 0x02, 0x00, 0x34, 0x07, 0x07, 0x1C, 0x59, 0x34, 0x6F, 0xE1, 0x83, 0x00, 0x00, 0x41, 0x06, 0x06, 0x7B, 0x3C, 0xFF, 0xCF, 0x3C, 0xC0 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // http://www.ite.org/standards/1203v03-04%20Part%201%20dms2011.pdfDi2015NewLine    // Page 158, CRC = 0x52EDDi2015NewLine    ushort fcs = compute_fcs(pattern); // 0x52EDDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18595581Di2015UniqueSeparatorCRC = 0x52ED
18595581Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring str = "[jp3]TEST [fl]Flashing[/fl]";Di2015NewLinevar bytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(str);Di2015NewLineArray.Resize(ref bytes, bytes.Length + 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Note that these two rows are useless, because the Array.Resize will have already filled with 0Di2015NewLinebytes[bytes.Length - 2] = 0; // dmsMessageBeaconDi2015NewLinebytes[bytes.Length - 1] = 0; // dmsMessagePixelService Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineushort fcs2 = compute_fcs(bytes); // 0xF995Di2015NewLinevar bytes2 = BitConverter.GetBytes(fcs2); // 0x95 0xF9Di2015NewLine

ConcurrentQueue<CallbackObject> queue = new ConcurrentQueue<CallbackObject>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IAsyncResult BeginWait(AsyncCallback callback, object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (callback==null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("callback","callback cannot be null");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine (Interlocked.Decrement(ref this.counter)>=0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            o.CompletedSynchronously= execute = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine this.counter)<1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!queue.TryDequeue(out execute))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new maxCounter)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new SemaphoreFullException("Release was called too many times");Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine 18600928Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.CodeDom;Di2015NewLineusing System.CodeDom.Compiler;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Permissions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.Services.Description;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConnectionLibDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class WSProxyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, Unrestricted = true)]Di2015NewLine        public static object CallWebService(string webServiceAsmxUrl, string serviceName, string methodName, object[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Net.WebClient client = new System.Net.WebClient();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Connect To the web serviceDi2015NewLine            System.IO.Stream stream = client.OpenRead(webServiceAsmxUrl + "?wsdl");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Now read the WSDL file describing a service.Di2015NewLine            ServiceDescription description = ServiceDescription.Read(stream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ///// LOAD THE DOM /////////Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Initialize a service description importer.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ServiceDescriptionImporter importer = new ServiceDescriptionImporter();Di2015NewLine            importer.ProtocolName = "Soap12"; // Use SOAP 1.2.Di2015NewLine            importer.AddServiceDescription(description, null, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Generate a proxy client.Di2015NewLine            importer.Style = ServiceDescriptionImportStyle.Client;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Generate properties to represent primitive values.Di2015NewLine            importer.CodeGenerationOptions = System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions.GenerateProperties;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Initialize a Code-DOM tree into which we will import the service.Di2015NewLine            CodeNamespace nmspace = new CodeNamespace();Di2015NewLine            CodeCompileUnit unit1 = new CodeCompileUnit();Di2015NewLine            unit1.Namespaces.Add(nmspace);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Import the service into the Code-DOM tree. This creates proxy code that uses the service.Di2015NewLine            ServiceDescriptionImportWarnings warning = importer.Import(nmspace, unit1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (warning == 0) // If zero then we are good to goDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Generate the proxy codeDi2015NewLine                CodeDomProvider provider1 = CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider("CSharp");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Compile the assembly proxy with the appropriate referencesDi2015NewLine                string[] assemblyReferences = new string[5] { "System.dll", "System.Web.Services.dll", "System.Web.dll", "System.Xml.dll", "System.Data.dll" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                CompilerParameters parms = new CompilerParameters(assemblyReferences);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                CompilerResults results = provider1.CompileAssemblyFromDom(parms, unit1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Check For ErrorsDi2015NewLine                if (results.Errors.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (CompilerError oops in results.Errors)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine("========Compiler error============");Di2015NewLine                        System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(oops.ErrorText);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    throw new System.Exception("Compile Error Occured calling webservice. Check Debug ouput window.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Finally, Invoke the web service methodDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                object wsvcClass = results.CompiledAssembly.CreateInstance(serviceName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                MethodInfo mi = wsvcClass.GetType().GetMethod(methodName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return mi.Invoke(wsvcClass, args);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18601080Di2015UniqueSeparatorFlattenHierarchy
18601080Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> FlattenProperties(Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Assumption #1: you do not want "simple" types enumeratedDi2015NewLine    if (!type.IsClass)Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Empty<PropertyInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Assumption #2: you want to ignore "the usual suspects"Di2015NewLine    if (type.Namespace != null && type.Namespace.StartsWith("System"))Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Empty<PropertyInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Assumption #3: your class hierarchy won't destroy recursionDi2015NewLine    // Assumption #4: you simply want the PropertyInfoDi2015NewLine    return type.GetProperties(BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchyDi2015NewLine                            | BindingFlags.InstanceDi2015NewLine                            | BindingFlags.Public)Di2015NewLine               .SelectMany(pi => new[] { pi }Di2015NewLine                              .Concat(FlattenProperties(pi.PropertyType)));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18601080Di2015UniqueSeparator// Replace Assumptions #1 and #2 above with this:Di2015NewLine// Assumption #5: given interface ISomething { }Di2015NewLineif (!typeof(ISomething).IsAssignableFrom(type))Di2015NewLine    return Enumerable.Empty<PropertyInfo>();Di2015NewLine
18601080Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<IEnumerable<PropertyInfo>> FlattenProperties(Di2015NewLine    Type type,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> ancestors = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // change to Assumptions #1/#2 or #5 to yield breakDi2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ancestors = ancestors ?? Enumerable.Empty<PropertyInfo>();Di2015NewLine    var properties = type.GetProperties(Di2015NewLine                          BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchyDi2015NewLine                        | BindingFlags.InstanceDi2015NewLine                        | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // again, Assumption #3: your class hierarchy won't destroy recursionDi2015NewLine        // Assumption #6: you actually want the initial nested property tooDi2015NewLine        yield return ancestors.Concat(new[] { property });Di2015NewLine        foreach (var nested in FlattenProperties(Di2015NewLine            property.PropertyType, Di2015NewLine            ancestors.Concat(new [] { property })))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return nested;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18604761Di2015UniqueSeparatorItem sum = (from p in typeof(Item).GetFields()Di2015NewLine          where Type.GetTypeCode(p.FieldType) == TypeCode.Int32 || Type.GetTypeCode(p.FieldType) == TypeCode.DoubleDi2015NewLine          group p by p into gDi2015NewLine          select new { Prop=g.Key, Sum=items.Sum(s => (decimal)Convert.ChangeType(g.Key.GetValue(s), TypeCode.Decimal)) })Di2015NewLine          .Aggregate(new Item(), (state, next) => {  Di2015NewLine            next.Prop.SetValue(state, Convert.ChangeType(next.Sum, next.Prop.FieldType));Di2015NewLine            return state;Di2015NewLine          });Di2015NewLine
18604761Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ItemDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int bar1 = 0;Di2015NewLine        public int bar2 = 0;Di2015NewLine        public double foobar1 = 0;Di2015NewLine        public double foobar2 = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var items = new List<Item>();Di2015NewLine        items.Add(new Item() { bar1 = 1, bar2 = 2, foobar1 = 1.1, foobar2 = 1.2 });Di2015NewLine        items.Add(new Item() { bar1 = 1, bar2 = 2, foobar1 = 1.1, foobar2 = 1.2 });Di2015NewLine        items.Add(new Item() { bar1 = 1, bar2 = 2, foobar1 = 1.1, foobar2 = 1.2 });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sum = (from p in typeof(Item).GetFields()Di2015NewLine                  where Type.GetTypeCode(p.FieldType) == TypeCode.Int32 || Type.GetTypeCode(p.FieldType) == TypeCode.DoubleDi2015NewLine                  group p by p into gDi2015NewLine                  select new { Prop=g.Key, Sum=items.Sum(s => (decimal)Convert.ChangeType(g.Key.GetValue(s), TypeCode.Decimal)) })Di2015NewLine                  .Aggregate(new Item(), (state, next) => {  Di2015NewLine                    next.Prop.SetValue(state, Convert.ChangeType(next.Sum, next.Prop.FieldType));Di2015NewLine                    return state;Di2015NewLine                  });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("bar1: " + sum.bar1);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("bar2: " + sum.bar2);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("foobar1: " + sum.foobar1);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("foobar2: " + sum.foobar2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18605833Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RTBTextPointerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int RowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine        set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int ColumnDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine        set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(null, obj))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(this, obj))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var other = obj as RTBTextPointer;Di2015NewLine        if (other == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return other.Row == Row && other.Column == Column;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        uncheckedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // 397 or some other prime numberDi2015NewLine            return (Row * 397) ^ Column;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18605833Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetHashCode
18605833Di2015UniqueSeparatoruncheckedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = 0;Di2015NewLine    result = (result * 397) ^ (Prop1 != null ? Prop3.GetHashCode() : 0);Di2015NewLine    result = (result * 397) ^ (Prop4 != null ? Prop4.GetHashCode() : 0);Di2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The Namespace Object (Session) has a collection of accounts.Di2015NewLine            Outlook.Accounts accounts = StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Loop over all accounts and print detail account information.Di2015NewLine            // All properties of the Account object are name of the account.Di2015NewLine                builder.AppendFormat("DisplayName: {0}\\n", account.DisplayName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // The UserName property provides an property provides the SMTP address for the account.Di2015NewLine                builder.AppendFormat("SmtpAddress: {0}\\n", account.SmtpAddress);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // The AccountType property indicates the type of the account.Di2015NewLine                builder.Append("AccountType: ");Di2015NewLine                switch (account.AccountType)Di2015NewLine information.Di2015NewLine            System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show(builder.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18606270Di2015UniqueSeparator private string Compress(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(text);Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        using (GZipStream zip = new GZipStream(ms, CompressionMode.Compress, true))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            zip.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream outStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] compressed = new byte[ms.Length];Di2015NewLine        ms.Read(compressed, 0, compressed.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] gzBuffer = new byte[compressed.Length + 4];Di2015NewLine        System.Buffer.BlockCopy(compressed, 0, gzBuffer, 4, compressed.Length);Di2015NewLine        System.Buffer.BlockCopy(BitConverter.GetBytes(buffer.Length), 0, gzBuffer, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine        return Convert.ToBase64String(gzBuffer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
18606270Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate String Decompress(String compressedText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] compressed = compressedText.getBytes("UTF8");Di2015NewLine    compressed = org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Base64.decodeBase64(compressed);Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer=new byte[compressed.length-4];Di2015NewLine    buffer = copyForDecompression(compressed,buffer, 4, 0);Di2015NewLine    final int BUFFER_SIZE = 32;Di2015NewLine    ByteArrayInputStream is = new ByteArrayInputStream(buffer);Di2015NewLine    GZIPInputStream gis = new GZIPInputStream(is, BUFFER_SIZE);Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder string = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    byte[] data = new byte[BUFFER_SIZE];Di2015NewLine    int bytesRead;Di2015NewLine    while ((bytesRead = gis.read(data)) != -1) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string.append(new String(data, 0, bytesRead));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    gis.close();Di2015NewLine    is.close();Di2015NewLine    return string.toString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate  byte[] copyForDecompression(byte[] b1,byte[] b2,int srcoffset,int dstoffset)Di2015NewLine{       Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0;i<b2.length && i<b1.length;i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        b2[i]=b1[i+4];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return b2;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18611710Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static String SignThis(String StringToSign, string Key, string Account)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String signature = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            byte[] unicodeKey = Convert.FromBase64String(Key);Di2015NewLine            using (HMACSHA256 hmacSha256 = new HMACSHA256(unicodeKey))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Byte[] dataToHmac = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(canonicalizedString);Di2015NewLine                signature = Convert.ToBase64String(hmacSha256.ComputeHash(dataToHmac));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            String authorizationHeader = String.Format(Di2015NewLine                  CultureInfo.InvariantCulture,Di2015NewLine                  "{0} {1}:{2}",Di2015NewLine                  "SharedKey",Di2015NewLine                  Account,Di2015NewLine                  signature);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return authorizationHeader;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
18611710Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringToSign
18611710Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringToSign
18611710Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring StringToSign =  "GET\\n"Di2015NewLine    + "\\n" // content encodingDi2015NewLine    + "\\n" // content languageDi2015NewLine    + "\\n" // content lengthDi2015NewLine    + "\\n" // content md5Di2015NewLine    + "\\n" // content typeDi2015NewLine    + "\\n" // dateDi2015NewLine    + "\\n" // if modified sinceDi2015NewLine    + "\\n" // if matchDi2015NewLine    + "\\n" // if none matchDi2015NewLine    + "\\n" // if unmodified sinceDi2015NewLine    + "\\n" // rangeDi2015NewLine    + "x-ms-date: 2013-09-04\\nx-ms-version:2012-02-12\\n" // headersDi2015NewLine    + "/account/$logs\\ncomp:list\\nrestype:container"; // resources Di2015NewLine
18611710Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void ListContainers()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string Account = "account";Di2015NewLine    string Key = "key";Di2015NewLine    string Container = "$logs";Di2015NewLine    DateTime dt = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine    string StringToSign = String.Format("GET\\n"Di2015NewLine        + "\\n" // content encodingDi2015NewLine        + "\\n" // content languageDi2015NewLine        + "\\n" // content lengthDi2015NewLine        + "\\n" // content md5Di2015NewLine        + "\\n" // content typeDi2015NewLine        + "\\n" // dateDi2015NewLine        + "\\n" // if modified sinceDi2015NewLine        + "\\n" // if matchDi2015NewLine        + "\\n" // if none matchDi2015NewLine        + "\\n" // if unmodified sinceDi2015NewLine        + "\\n" // rangeDi2015NewLine        + "x-ms-date:" + dt.ToString("R") + "\\nx-ms-version:2012-02-12\\n" // headersDi2015NewLine        + "/{0}/{1}\\ncomp:list\\nrestype:container", Account, Container);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string auth = SignThis(StringToSign, Key, Account);Di2015NewLine    string method = "GET";Di2015NewLine    string urlPath = string.Format("https://{0}.blob.core.windows.net/{1}?restype=container&comp=list", Account, Container);Di2015NewLine    Uri uri = new Uri(urlPath);Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(uri);Di2015NewLine    request.Method = method;Di2015NewLine    request.Headers.Add("x-ms-date", dt.ToString("R"));Di2015NewLine    request.Headers.Add("x-ms-version", "2012-02-12");Di2015NewLine    request.Headers.Add("Authorization", auth);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18611813Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.SqlClient;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string Query = "SELECT * FROM [MyTable]";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //db connection configDi2015NewLine        DbConfigInfo Config = new DbConfigInfo()Di2015NewLine                                  {Di2015NewLine                                      ServerAddress = "MyServer",Di2015NewLine                                      DbName = "MyDb",Di2015NewLine                                      TrustedConnection = trueDi2015NewLine                                  };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //db adapter for communicationDi2015NewLine        DbAdapter Adapter = new DbAdapter()Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    DbConfig = ConfigDi2015NewLine                                };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //output with dataDi2015NewLine        DataTable MyDataTable;Di2015NewLine        if (!Adapter.ExecuteSqlCommandAsTable(Query, out MyDataTable))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Error Occured!");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //do actions with your DataTableDi2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DbAdapterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //keeps connection infoDi2015NewLine    public DbConfigInfo DbConfig { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool ExecuteSqlCommandAsTable(string CmdText, out DataTable ResultTable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ResultTable = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (SqlConnection Conn = new SqlConnection(DbConfig.GetConnectionStringForMssql2008()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SqlCommand Cmd = new SqlCommand(CmdText, Conn);Di2015NewLine                Conn.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SqlDataReader Reader = Cmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine                DataTable ReturnValue = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine                ReturnValue.Load(Reader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ResultTable = ReturnValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DbConfigInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string ServerAddress { get; set; } //address of server - IP address or local nameDi2015NewLine    public string DbName { get; set; } //name of database - if you want create new database in query, set this to masterDi2015NewLine    public string User { get; set; } //user name - only if winauth is offDi2015NewLine    public string Password { get; set; } //user password - only if winauth is offDi2015NewLine    public bool TrustedConnection { get; set; } //if integrated windows authenticating under currently logged win user should be used Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //creates conn string from dataDi2015NewLine    public string GetConnectionStringForMssql2008()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder ConStringBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ConStringBuilder.Append(string.Format("Data Source={0};", ServerAddress))Di2015NewLine                        .Append(string.Format("Initial Catalog={0};", DbName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (TrustedConnection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ConStringBuilder.Append("Trusted_Connection=True;");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ConStringBuilder.Append(string.Format("User Id={0};", User))Di2015NewLine                            .Append(string.Format("Password={0};", Password));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ConStringBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18614503Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PrintHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Canvas PrintingRoot { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string TextToBePrint { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string PrintingFileName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static int currentPreviewPage;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static PrintDocument printDocument = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IPrintDocumentSource printDocumentSource = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static List<PageLoadState> printPreviewPages = new List<PageLoadState>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const double ApplicationContentMarginLeft = 0.075;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const double ApplicationContentMarginTop = 0.03;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool ShowTextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return ((int)imageText & (int)DisplayContent.Text) == (int)DisplayContent.Text; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static DisplayContent imageText = DisplayContent.TextAndImages;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void PrintTaskRequested(PrintManager sender, PrintTaskRequestedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PrintTask printTask = e.Request.CreatePrintTask(PrintingFileName, sourceRequested => sourceRequested.SetSource(printDocumentSource));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void RegisterForPrinting()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create the PrintDocument.Di2015NewLine        printDocument = new PrintDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Save the DocumentSource.Di2015NewLine        printDocumentSource = printDocument.DocumentSource;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add an event handler which creates preview pages.Di2015NewLine        printDocument.Paginate += CreatePrintPreviewPages;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add an event handler which provides a specified preview page.Di2015NewLine        printDocument.GetPreviewPage += GetPrintPreviewPage;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add an event handler which provides all final print pages.Di2015NewLine        printDocument.AddPages += AddPrintPages;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a PrintManager and add a handler for printing initialization.Di2015NewLine        PrintManager printMan = PrintManager.GetForCurrentView();Di2015NewLine        printMan.PrintTaskRequested += PrintTaskRequested;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void UnregisterForPrinting()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Set the instance of the PrintDocument to null.Di2015NewLine        printDocument = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Remove the handler for printing initialization.Di2015NewLine        PrintManager printMan = PrintManager.GetForCurrentView();Di2015NewLine        printMan.PrintTaskRequested -= PrintTaskRequested;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static event EventHandler pagesCreated;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void CreatePrintPreviewPages(object sender, PaginateEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Clear the cache of preview pages Di2015NewLine        printPreviewPages.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Clear the printing root of preview pagesDi2015NewLine        PrintingRoot.Children.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This variable keeps track of the last RichTextBlockOverflow element that was added to a page which will be printedDi2015NewLine        RichTextBlockOverflow lastRTBOOnPage;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the PrintTaskOptionsDi2015NewLine        PrintTaskOptions printingOptions = ((PrintTaskOptions)e.PrintTaskOptions);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the page description to deterimine how big the page isDi2015NewLine        PrintPageDescription pageDescription = printingOptions.GetPageDescription(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // We know there is at least one page to be printed. passing null as the first parameter toDi2015NewLine        // AddOnePrintPreviewPage tells the function to add the first page.Di2015NewLine        lastRTBOOnPage = AddOnePrintPreviewPage(null, pageDescription);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // We know there are more pages to be added as long as the last RichTextBoxOverflow added to a print previewDi2015NewLine        // page has extra contentDi2015NewLine        while (lastRTBOOnPage.HasOverflowContent)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lastRTBOOnPage = AddOnePrintPreviewPage(lastRTBOOnPage, pageDescription);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (pagesCreated != null)Di2015NewLine            pagesCreated.Invoke(printPreviewPages, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Report the number of preview pages createdDi2015NewLine        printDocument.SetPreviewPageCount(printPreviewPages.Count, PreviewPageCountType.Intermediate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void GetPrintPreviewPage(object sender, GetPreviewPageEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Interlocked.Exchange(ref currentPreviewPage, e.PageNumber - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PageLoadState pageLoadState = printPreviewPages[e.PageNumber - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!pageLoadState.Ready)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Notify the user that some content is not available yetDi2015NewLine            // Apps may also opt to don't show preview untill everything is complete and just use await IsReadyAsyncDi2015NewLine            //rootPage.NotifyUser("Image loading not complete, previewing only text", NotifyType.ErrorMessage);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the preview even if images failed to load properlyDi2015NewLine        printDocument.SetPreviewPage(e.PageNumber, pageLoadState.Page);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void AddPrintPages(object sender, AddPagesEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Loop over all of the preview pages and add each one to  add each page to be printiedDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < printPreviewPages.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We should have all pages ready at this point...Di2015NewLine            printDocument.AddPage(printPreviewPages[i].Page);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Indicate that all of the print pages have been providedDi2015NewLine        printDocument.AddPagesComplete();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static RichTextBlockOverflow AddOnePrintPreviewPage(RichTextBlockOverflow lastRTBOAdded, PrintPageDescription printPageDescription)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a cavase which represents the page Di2015NewLine        Canvas page = new Canvas();Di2015NewLine        page.Width = printPageDescription.PageSize.Width;Di2015NewLine        page.Height = printPageDescription.PageSize.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PageLoadState pageState = new PageLoadState(page, printPreviewPages.Count);Di2015NewLine        pageState.ReadyAction = async (pageNumber, currentPage) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Ignore if this is not the current pageDi2015NewLine            if (Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref currentPreviewPage, currentPreviewPage, pageNumber) == pageNumber)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                await Window.Current.Dispatcher.RunAsync(Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcherPriority.Normal, () =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //await new Windows.UI.Popups.MessageDialog("Content loaded").ShowAsync();Di2015NewLine                    printDocument.SetPreviewPage(pageNumber + 1, currentPage);Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a grid which contains the actual content to be printedDi2015NewLine        Grid content = new Grid();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the margins sizeDi2015NewLine        // If the ImageableRect is smaller than the app provided margins use the ImageableRectDi2015NewLine        double marginWidth = Math.Max(printPageDescription.PageSize.Width - printPageDescription.ImageableRect.Width,Di2015NewLine                                    printPageDescription.PageSize.Width * ApplicationContentMarginLeft * 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double marginHeight = Math.Max(printPageDescription.PageSize.Height - printPageDescription.ImageableRect.Height,Di2015NewLine                                        printPageDescription.PageSize.Height * ApplicationContentMarginTop * 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set content size based on the given marginsDi2015NewLine        content.Width = printPageDescription.PageSize.Width - marginWidth;Di2015NewLine        content.Height = printPageDescription.PageSize.Height - marginHeight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set content marginsDi2015NewLine        content.SetValue(Canvas.LeftProperty, marginWidth / 2);Di2015NewLine        content.SetValue(Canvas.TopProperty, marginHeight / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the RowDefinitions to the Grid which is a content to be printedDi2015NewLine        RowDefinition rowDef = new RowDefinition();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        rowDef.Height = new GridLength(2.5, GridUnitType.Star);Di2015NewLine        content.RowDefinitions.Add(rowDef);Di2015NewLine        rowDef = new RowDefinition();Di2015NewLine        rowDef.Height = new GridLength(3.5, GridUnitType.Star);Di2015NewLine        content.RowDefinitions.Add(rowDef);Di2015NewLine        rowDef = new RowDefinition();Di2015NewLine        rowDef.Height = new GridLength(1.5, GridUnitType.Star);Di2015NewLine        content.RowDefinitions.Add(rowDef);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If lastRTBOAdded is null then we know we are creating the first page. Di2015NewLine        bool isFirstPage = lastRTBOAdded == null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FrameworkElement previousLTCOnPage = null;Di2015NewLine        RichTextBlockOverflow rtbo = new RichTextBlockOverflow();Di2015NewLine        // Create the linked containers and and add them to the content gridDi2015NewLine        if (isFirstPage)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The first linked container in a chain of linked containers is is always a RichTextBlockDi2015NewLine            RichTextBlock rtbl = new RichTextBlock();Di2015NewLine            rtbl.SetValue(Grid.RowProperty, 0);Di2015NewLine            rtbl = AddContentToRTBl(rtbl);Di2015NewLine            int a = rtbl.Blocks.Count();Di2015NewLine            rtbl.Foreground = new SolidColorBrush(Windows.UI.Colors.Black);Di2015NewLine            content.Children.Add(rtbl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save the RichTextBlock as the last linked container added to this pageDi2015NewLine            previousLTCOnPage = rtbl;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // This is not the first page so the first element on this page has to be aDi2015NewLine            // RichTextBoxOverflow that links to the last RichTextBlockOverflow added toDi2015NewLine            // the previous page.Di2015NewLine            rtbo = new RichTextBlockOverflow();Di2015NewLine            rtbo.SetValue(Grid.RowProperty, 0);Di2015NewLine            content.Children.Add(rtbo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Keep text flowing from the previous page to this page by setting the linked text container justDi2015NewLine            // created (rtbo) as the OverflowContentTarget for the last linked text container from the previous page Di2015NewLine            lastRTBOAdded.OverflowContentTarget = rtbo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save the RichTextBlockOverflow as the last linked container added to this pageDi2015NewLine            previousLTCOnPage = rtbo;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ShowText)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Create the next linked text container for on this page.Di2015NewLine            rtbo = new RichTextBlockOverflow();Di2015NewLine            rtbo.SetValue(Grid.RowProperty, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add the RichTextBlockOverflow to the content to be printed.Di2015NewLine            content.Children.Add(rtbo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add the new RichTextBlockOverflow to the chain of linked text containers. To do this we much checkDi2015NewLine            // to see if the previous container is a RichTextBlock or RichTextBlockOverflow.Di2015NewLine            if (previousLTCOnPage is RichTextBlock)Di2015NewLine                ((RichTextBlock)previousLTCOnPage).OverflowContentTarget = rtbo;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                ((RichTextBlockOverflow)previousLTCOnPage).OverflowContentTarget = rtbo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save the last linked text container added to the chainDi2015NewLine            previousLTCOnPage = rtbo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create the next linked text container for on this page.Di2015NewLine            rtbo = new RichTextBlockOverflow();Di2015NewLine            rtbo.SetValue(Grid.RowProperty, 2);Di2015NewLine            content.Children.Add(rtbo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add the new RichTextBlockOverflow to the chain of linked text containers. We don't have to checkDi2015NewLine            // the type of the previous linked container this time because we know it's a RichTextBlockOverflow elementDi2015NewLine            ((RichTextBlockOverflow)previousLTCOnPage).OverflowContentTarget = rtbo;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // We are done creating the content for this page. Add it to the Canvas which represents the pageDi2015NewLine        page.Children.Add(content);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the newley created page to the printing root which is part of the visual tree and force it to goDi2015NewLine        // through layout so that the linked containers correctly distribute the content inside them.Di2015NewLine        PrintingRoot.Children.Add(page);Di2015NewLine        PrintingRoot.InvalidateMeasure();Di2015NewLine        PrintingRoot.UpdateLayout();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the newley created page to the list of pagesDi2015NewLine        printPreviewPages.Add(pageState);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the last linked container added to the pageDi2015NewLine        return rtbo;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static RichTextBlock AddContentToRTBl(RichTextBlock rtbl)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a Run and give it contentDi2015NewLine        Run run = new Run();Di2015NewLine        run.Text = TextToBePrint;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a paragraph, set it's property according to text box.Di2015NewLine        Paragraph para = new Paragraph();Di2015NewLine        para.FontSize = 20;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        para.Inlines.Add(run);Di2015NewLine        // Add the paragraph to the blocks collection of the RichTextBlockDi2015NewLine        rtbl.Blocks.Add(para);Di2015NewLine        return rtbl;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static async Task ShowPrintUIAsync(Canvas PrintingCanvas, string textToBePrint, string FileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (PrintingCanvas == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new NullReferenceException("Canvas must be present in XAML. It is for showing print preview.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(FileName))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("The file name for the document which is going to be print must not be empty or only white space.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PrintingRoot = PrintingCanvas;Di2015NewLine        TextToBePrint = textToBePrint;Di2015NewLine        PrintingFileName = FileName;Di2015NewLine        UnregisterForPrinting();Di2015NewLine        RegisterForPrinting();Di2015NewLine        await PrintManager.ShowPrintUIAsync();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PageLoadStateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private CountdownEvent loadingElements;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Action<int, UIElement> ReadyAction { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int pageNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private UIElement page;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public UIElement PageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return page; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PageLoadState(UIElement page, int pageNumber)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.page = page;Di2015NewLine        this.pageNumber = pageNumber;Di2015NewLine        loadingElements = new CountdownEvent(0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetElementComplete()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        loadingElements.Signal();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ListenForCompletion(BitmapImage bitmap)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (loadingElements.CurrentCount == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Event is already signaled. Manually set the count to 1 and "arm" the event.Di2015NewLine            loadingElements.Reset(1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // AddCount will throw if event is already in signaled state.Di2015NewLine            loadingElements.AddCount();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        bitmap.ImageOpened += (s, e) => SetElementComplete();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool ReadyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var ready = loadingElements.CurrentCount == 0;Di2015NewLine            if (!ready)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // A request was made and the content is not ready, serve it once it's completeDi2015NewLine                Task.Run(async () =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    await IsReadyAsync();Di2015NewLine                    ReadyAction(pageNumber, page);Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return ready;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public async Task IsReadyAsync()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        await Task.Run(() => { loadingElements.Wait(); });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal enum DisplayContent : intDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Text = 1,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Images = 2,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TextAndImages = 3Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

All parameters are optional. Specifying contenttype=app? will limit the search to apps. FireReconfigurationErrorEvent(Exception exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (exception == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("exception");Di2015NewLine        if (EventLoggingEnabled)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string entryText = eventLogEntryFormatter.GetEntryText("An unknown error occurred reconfiguring the Logging Application Block. 18617354Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EncryptionManagementDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private static SymmetricAlgorithm encryption;Di2015NewLine  private const string password = "admin";Di2015NewLine  private const string Mkey = "MY SECRET KEY";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static void Init()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    encryption = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine    var key = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(password, Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Mkey));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    encryption.Key = key.GetBytes(encryption.KeySize / 8);Di2015NewLine    encryption.IV = key.GetBytes(encryption.BlockSize / 8);Di2015NewLine    encryption.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static void Encrypt(Stream inStream, Stream OutStream)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Init();Di2015NewLine    var encryptor = encryption.CreateEncryptor();Di2015NewLine    inStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine    var encryptStream = new CryptoStream(OutStream, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine    inStream.CopyTo(encryptStream);Di2015NewLine    encryptStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static void Decrypt(Stream inStream, Stream OutStream)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Init();Di2015NewLine    var encryptor = encryption.CreateDecryptor();Di2015NewLine    inStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine    var encryptStream = new CryptoStream(inStream, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read);Di2015NewLine    encryptStream.CopyTo(OutStream);Di2015NewLine    OutStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18622699Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Export(System.Data.DataTable CrossoverDataTable)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // @@ParametersDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // CrossoverDataTable DataTable :Di2015NewLine    //     This is a data table containing information to be exported to our excel application.Di2015NewLine    //     Requested as a way to circumvent sql injection opposed to the initial overload accepting only a string .commandtext.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Application xls = new Application();Di2015NewLine    xls.SheetsInNewWorkbook = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create our new excel application and add our workbooks/worksheetsDi2015NewLine    Workbook Workbook = xls.Workbooks.Add();Di2015NewLine    Worksheet CrossoverPartsWorksheet = xls.Worksheets[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Hide our excel object if it's visible.Di2015NewLine    xls.Visible = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Turn off screen updating so our export will process more quickly.Di2015NewLine    xls.ScreenUpdating = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Turn off calculations if set to automatic; this can help prevent memory leaks.Di2015NewLine    xls.Calculation = xls.Calculation == XlCalculation.xlCalculationAutomatic ? XlCalculation.xlCalculationManual : XlCalculation.xlCalculationManual;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create an excel table and fill it will our query table.Di2015NewLine CrossoverDataTable.Columns[column].ColumnName;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Export our datatable information to excel.Di2015NewLine        for (int row = 0; row < CrossoverDataTable.Rows.Count; row++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int column = 0; column < CrossoverDataTable.Columns.Count; column++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Freeze our column headers.Di2015NewLine    xls.Application.Rows["2:2"].Select();Di2015NewLine    xls.ActiveWindow.FreezePanes = true;Di2015NewLine    xls.ActiveWindow.DisplayGridlines = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Autofit our rows and columns.Di2015NewLine    xls.Application.Cells.EntireColumn.AutoFit();Di2015NewLine have excel sheets show on screen after creation.Di2015NewLine    // ******************************************************************************************************************Di2015NewLine 18622720Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal struct ArrayPtr<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static ArrayPtr<T> Null { get { return default(ArrayPtr<T>); } }Di2015NewLine  private readonly T[] source;Di2015NewLine  private readonly int index;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private ArrayPtr(ArrayPtr<T> old, int delta)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.source = old.source;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public ArrayPtr(T[] source)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.source = source;Di2015NewLine    index = 0;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public bool    Debug.Assert(Object.ReferenceEquals(a.source, b.source));Di2015NewLine    return a.index < b.index;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static bool operator >(ArrayPtr<T> a, }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static bool operator >=(ArrayPtr<T> a, ArrayPtr<T> b)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(Object.ReferenceEquals(a.source, b.source));Di2015NewLine    return a.index >= b.index;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static int operator -(ArrayPtr<T> a, ArrayPtr<T> b)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine 18637187Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void PopulateGridView<T>(GridView grid, DbSet entityTable)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string columnToSortBy = (string)(ViewState["gridview_sortbycolumn"] ?? string.Empty);Di2015NewLine    SortDirection sortDirection = (SortDirection)(ViewState["gridview_sortdirection"] ?? SortDirection.Descending);Di2015NewLine    int pageIndex = (int)(ViewState["gridview_pageindex"] ?? 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (columnToSortBy != string.Empty)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        grid.DataSource = entityTable.OrderBy(columnToSortBy + " " + sortDirection).Cast<T>().ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // use linq reflection to get the first entity field name to sort byDi2015NewLine        string defaultColumn = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var field in typeof(T).GetFields(BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            defaultColumn = field.Name.Remove(field.Name.IndexOf(">")).Replace("<", string.Empty);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        grid.DataSource = entityTable.OrderBy(defaultColumn).Cast<T>().ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    grid.PageIndex = pageIndex;Di2015NewLine    grid.DataBind();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18637934Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetSelectedTypes
18637934Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> GetSelectedTypes(Dictionary<string, List<string>> validTypes, IEnumerable<string> userSelection )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var kvp in validTypes)Di2015NewLine        // if the key is in userSelection, only return the key, but no itemsDi2015NewLine        if (userSelection.Contains(kvp.Key))Di2015NewLine            yield return kvp.Key;Di2015NewLine        // if not, only return valid itemsDi2015NewLine        else Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in kvp.Value)Di2015NewLine                if (userSelection.Contains(item))Di2015NewLine                    yield return item;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18639040Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine namespace DirectoryWatcherDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine class ftpClass1Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine        private string host = null;Di2015NewLine        private string user = null;Di2015NewLine        private string pass = null;Di2015NewLine        private FtpWebRequest ftpRequest = null;Di2015NewLine        private FtpWebResponse ftpResponse = null;Di2015NewLine        private Stream ftpStream = null;Di2015NewLine        private int bufferSize = 2048;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Construct Object */Di2015NewLine        public ftpClass1(string hostIP, string userName, string password) { host = hostIP; user = userName; pass = password; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Download File */Di2015NewLine        public void download(string remoteFile, string localFile)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                /* Create an FTP Request */Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest = (FtpWebRequest)FtpWebRequest.Create(host + "/" + remoteFile);Di2015NewLine                /* Log in to the FTP Server with the User Name and Password Provided */Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(user, pass);Di2015NewLine                /* When in doubt, use these options */Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest.UseBinary = true;Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest.UsePassive = true;Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest.KeepAlive = true;Di2015NewLine                /* Specify the Type of FTP Request */Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest.Method = WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile;Di2015NewLine                /* Establish Return Communication with the FTP Server */Di2015NewLine                ftpResponse = (FtpWebResponse)ftpRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine                /* Get the FTP Server's Response Stream */Di2015NewLine                ftpStream = ftpResponse.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine                /* Open a File Stream to Write the Downloaded File */Di2015NewLine                FileStream localFileStream = new FileStream(localFile, FileMode.Create);Di2015NewLine                /* Buffer for the Downloaded Data */Di2015NewLine                byte[] byteBuffer = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine                int bytesRead = ftpStream.Read(byteBuffer, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine                /* Download the File by Writing the Buffered Data Until the Transfer is Complete */Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    while (bytesRead > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        localFileStream.Write(byteBuffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine                        bytesRead = ftpStream.Read(byteBuffer, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex) { Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString()); }Di2015NewLine                /* Resource Cleanup */Di2015NewLine                localFileStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                ftpStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                ftpResponse.Close();Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex) { Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString()); }Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Upload File */Di2015NewLine        public void upload(string remoteFile, string localFile)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                /* Create an FTP Request */Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest = (FtpWebRequest)FtpWebRequest.Create(host + remoteFile);Di2015NewLine                /* Log in to the FTP Server with the User Name and Password Provided */Di2015NewLine            ftpRequest.UsePassive = true;Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest.KeepAlive = true;Di2015NewLine                /* Specify the Type of FTP Request */Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest.Method = WebRequestMethods.Ftp.UploadFile;Di2015NewLine                /* Establish Return Communication with the FTP Server */Di2015NewLine                ftpStream = ftpRequest.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine                /* Open a File Stream to Read the File for Upload */Di2015NewLine                FileStream localFileStream = new FileStream(localFile, FileMode.Create);Di2015NewLine                /* Buffer for the Downloaded Data */Di2015NewLine                byte[] byteBuffer = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine                int bytesSent = localFileStream.Read(byteBuffer, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine                /* Upload the File by Sending the Buffered Data Until the Transfer is Complete */Di2015NewLine bytesSent);Di2015NewLine                        bytesSent = localFileStream.Read(byteBuffer, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex) { Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString()); }Di2015NewLine                /* Resource Cleanup */Di2015NewLine                localFileStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                ftpStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex) { Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString()); }Di2015NewLine */Di2015NewLine                ftpResponse = (FtpWebResponse)ftpRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine                /* Establish Return Communication with the FTP Server */Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                /* Create an FTP Request */Di2015NewLine                ftpRequest = (FtpWebRequest)FtpWebRequest.Create(host +              /* Store the Raw Response */Di2015NewLine                string directoryRaw = null;Di2015NewLine                /* Read Each Line of the Response and Append a Pipe to Each Line for Easy Parsing */Di2015NewLine                try { while (ftpReader.Peek() != -1) { directoryRaw += ftpReader.ReadLine() + "|"; } }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex) { you Append (I use | in This Example) */Di2015NewLine                try { string[] directoryList = directoryRaw.Split("|".ToCharArray()); return directoryList; }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex) { Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString()); }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex) { Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString()); }Di2015NewLine            /* Return an Empty string Array if an Exception Occurs */Di2015NewLine            return new string[] { "" };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* List Directory Contents in Detail (Name,
