18642966Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string txt = @"Except oral wills, every will shall be in writing, Di2015NewLinebut may be handwritten or typewritten. The will shall contain the testator's Di2015NewLinesignature or by some other person in the testator's conscious presence and at theDi2015NewLinetestator's express direction . The will shall be attested and subscribed in theDi2015NewLineconscious presence of the testator, by two or more competent witnesses, who saw theDi2015NewLinetestator subscribe, or heard the testator acknowledge the testator's signature.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFor purposes of this section, conscious presence means within the range of any of theDi2015NewLinetestator's senses, excluding the sense of sight or sound that is sensed by telephonic,Di2015NewLineelectronic, or other distant communication.";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //split string using common seperators - could add more or use regex.Di2015NewLine    string[] words = txt.Split(',', '.', ';', ' ', '\\n', '\\r');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //trim each tring and get rid of any empty onesDi2015NewLine    words = words.Select(t=>t.Trim()).Where(t=>t.Trim()!=string.Empty).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int MaxPhraseLength = 20;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, int> Counts = new Dictionary<string,int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int phraseLen = MaxPhraseLength; phraseLen >= 2; phraseLen--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < words.Length - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //get the phrase to match based on phraselenDi2015NewLine            string[] phrase = GetPhrase(words, i, phraseLen);Di2015NewLine            string sphrase = string.Join(" ", phrase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Phrase : {0}", sphrase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int index = FindPhraseIndex(words, i+phrase.Length, phrase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (index > -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Phrase : {0} found at {1}", sphrase, index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if(!Counts.ContainsKey(sphrase))Di2015NewLine                    Counts.Add(sphrase, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Counts[sphrase]++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var foo in Counts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("[{0}] - {1}", foo.Key, foo.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic string[] GetPhrase(string[] words, int startpos, int len)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return words.Skip(startpos).Take(len).ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic int  FindPhraseIndex(string[] words, int startIndex, string[] matchWords)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = startIndex; i < words.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int j;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(j=0; j<matchWords.Length && (i+j)<words.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine            if(matchWords[j]!=words[i+j])Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (j == matchWords.Length)Di2015NewLine            return startIndex;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return -1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18643124Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic frmPhoneQueueViewer()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    //The default Opacity = 1 won't show your formDi2015NewLine    Opacity = 0.2f; //or even Opacity = 0.999 if you likeDi2015NewLine    //....Di2015NewLine    //....Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprotected override CreateParams CreateParams {Di2015NewLine    get {Di2015NewLine         CreateParams cp = base.CreateParams;Di2015NewLine         //WS_EX_LAYERED = 0x80000  WS_EX_TRANSPARENT = 0x20Di2015NewLine         cp.ExStyle |= 0x80000 | 0x20;                Di2015NewLine         return cp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18643124Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic frmPhoneQueueViewer()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    //The default Opacity = 1 will show your form normallyDi2015NewLine    Load += (s,e) => {Di2015NewLine        appliedStyles = true;Di2015NewLine        UpdateStyles();//Call this to apply the styles to make your window able to click through.Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    //....Di2015NewLine    //....Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinebool appliedStyles;Di2015NewLineprotected override CreateParams CreateParams {Di2015NewLine    get {Di2015NewLine         CreateParams cp = base.CreateParams;Di2015NewLine         //WS_EX_LAYERED = 0x80000  WS_EX_TRANSPARENT = 0x20Di2015NewLine         if(appliedStyles) cp.ExStyle |= 0x80000 | 0x20;                Di2015NewLine         return cp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
